2209 
2210 static char * colorChooserWinGui(
2211  char const * aTitle, /* NULL or "" */
2212  char const * aDefaultHexRGB, /* NULL or "#FF0000"*/
2213  unsigned char const aDefaultRGB[3], /* { 0 , 255 , 255 } */
2214  unsigned char aoResultRGB[3]) /* { 0 , 0 , 0 } */
2215 {
2216  static char lResultHexRGB[8];
2217 
2218  wchar_t lTitle[128];
2219  wchar_t lDefaultHexRGB[16];
2220  wchar_t * lTmpWChar;
2221  char * lTmpChar;
2222 
2223  if (aTitle)
2224  {
2225  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) lTmpWChar = tinyfd_utf8to16(aTitle);
2226  else lTmpWChar = tinyfd_mbcsTo16(aTitle);
2227  wcscpy(lTitle, lTmpWChar);
2228  }
2229  if (aDefaultHexRGB)
2230  {
2231  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) lTmpWChar = tinyfd_utf8to16(aDefaultHexRGB);
2232  else lTmpWChar = tinyfd_mbcsTo16(aDefaultHexRGB);
2233  wcscpy(lDefaultHexRGB, lTmpWChar);
2234  }
2235 
2236  lTmpWChar = tinyfd_colorChooserW(
2237  lTitle,
2238  lDefaultHexRGB,
2239  aDefaultRGB,
2240  aoResultRGB );
2241 
2242  if (!lTmpWChar)
2243  {
2244  return NULL;
2245  }
2246 
2247  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) lTmpChar = tinyfd_utf16to8(lTmpWChar);
2248  else lTmpChar = tinyfd_utf16toMbcs(lTmpWChar);
2249  strcpy(lResultHexRGB, lTmpChar);
2250 
2251  return lResultHexRGB;
2252 }
2253 
2254 
2255 static int dialogPresent(void)
2256 {
2257  static int lDialogPresent = -1 ;
2258  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
2259  FILE * lIn ;
2260  char const * lString = "dialog.exe";
2261  if (!tinyfd_allowCursesDialogs) return 0;
2262  if (lDialogPresent < 0)
2263  {
2264  if (!(lIn = _popen("where dialog.exe","r")))
2265  {
2266  lDialogPresent = 0 ;
2267  return 0 ;
2268  }
2269  while ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
2270  {}
2271  _pclose( lIn ) ;
2272  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
2273  {
2274  lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
2275  }
2276  if ( strcmp(lBuff+strlen(lBuff)-strlen(lString),lString) )
2277  {
2278  lDialogPresent = 0 ;
2279  }
2280  else
2281  {
2282  lDialogPresent = 1 ;
2283  }
2284  }
2285  return lDialogPresent;
2286 }
2287 
2288 
2289 static int messageBoxWinConsole(
2290  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
2291  char const * aMessage , /* NULL or "" may contain \n and \t */
2292  char const * aDialogType , /* "ok" "okcancel" "yesno" "yesnocancel" */
2293  char const * aIconType , /* "info" "warning" "error" "question" */
2294  int aDefaultButton ) /* 0 for cancel/no , 1 for ok/yes , 2 for no in yesnocancel */
2295 {
2296  char lDialogString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
2297  char lDialogFile[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
2298  FILE * lIn;
2299  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] = "";
2300 
2301  strcpy(lDialogString, "dialog ");
2302  if (aTitle && strlen(aTitle))
2303  {
2304  strcat(lDialogString, "--title \"") ;
2305  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
2306  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2307  }
2308 
2309  if ( aDialogType && ( !strcmp( "okcancel" , aDialogType )
2310  || !strcmp("yesno", aDialogType) || !strcmp("yesnocancel", aDialogType) ) )
2311  {
2312  strcat(lDialogString, "--backtitle \"") ;
2313  strcat(lDialogString, "tab: move focus") ;
2314  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2315  }
2316 
2317  if ( aDialogType && ! strcmp( "okcancel" , aDialogType ) )
2318  {
2319  if ( ! aDefaultButton )
2320  {
2321  strcat( lDialogString , "--defaultno " ) ;
2322  }
2323  strcat( lDialogString ,
2324  "--yes-label \"Ok\" --no-label \"Cancel\" --yesno " ) ;
2325  }
2326  else if ( aDialogType && ! strcmp( "yesno" , aDialogType ) )
2327  {
2328  if ( ! aDefaultButton )
2329  {
2330  strcat( lDialogString , "--defaultno " ) ;
2331  }
2332  strcat( lDialogString , "--yesno " ) ;
2333  }
2334  else if (aDialogType && !strcmp("yesnocancel", aDialogType))
2335  {
2336  if (!aDefaultButton)
2337  {
2338  strcat(lDialogString, "--defaultno ");
2339  }
2340  strcat(lDialogString, "--menu ");
2341  }
2342  else
2343  {
2344  strcat( lDialogString , "--msgbox " ) ;
2345  }
2346 
2347  strcat( lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
2348  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
2349  {
2350  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\n" , "\\n" , lBuff ) ;
2351  strcat(lDialogString, lBuff) ;
2352  lBuff[0]='\0';
2353  }
2354  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ");
2355 
2356  if (aDialogType && !strcmp("yesnocancel", aDialogType))
2357  {
2358  strcat(lDialogString, "0 60 0 Yes \"\" No \"\"");
2359  strcat(lDialogString, "2>>");
2360  }
2361  else
2362  {
2363  strcat(lDialogString, "10 60");
2364  strcat(lDialogString, " && echo 1 > ");
2365  }
2366 
2367  strcpy(lDialogFile, getenv("TEMP"));
2368  strcat(lDialogFile, "\\tinyfd.txt");
2369  strcat(lDialogString, lDialogFile);
2370 
2371  /*if (tinyfd_verbose) printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ;*/
2372  system( lDialogString ) ;
2373 
2374  if (!(lIn = fopen(lDialogFile, "r")))
2375  {
2376  remove(lDialogFile);
2377  return 0 ;
2378  }
2379  while (fgets(lBuff, sizeof(lBuff), lIn) != NULL)
2380  {}
2381  fclose(lIn);
2382  remove(lDialogFile);
2383  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
2384  {
2385  lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
2386  }
2387 
2388  /* if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("lBuff: %s\n", lBuff); */
2389  if ( ! strlen(lBuff) )
2390  {
2391  return 0;
2392  }
2393 
2394  if (aDialogType && !strcmp("yesnocancel", aDialogType))
2395  {
2396  if (lBuff[0] == 'Y') return 1;
2397  else return 2;
2398  }
2399 
2400  return 1;
2401 }
2402 
2403 
2404 static int inputBoxWinConsole(
2405  char * aoBuff ,
2406  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
2407  char const * aMessage , /* NULL or "" may NOT contain \n nor \t */
2408  char const * aDefaultInput ) /* "" , if NULL it's a passwordBox */
2409 {
2410  char lDialogString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
2411  char lDialogFile[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
2412  FILE * lIn;
2413  int lResult;
2414 
2415  strcpy(lDialogFile, getenv("TEMP"));
2416  strcat(lDialogFile, "\\tinyfd.txt");
2417  strcpy(lDialogString , "echo|set /p=1 >" ) ;
2418  strcat(lDialogString, lDialogFile);
2419  strcat( lDialogString , " & " ) ;
2420 
2421  strcat( lDialogString , "dialog " ) ;
2422  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
2423  {
2424  strcat(lDialogString, "--title \"") ;
2425  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
2426  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2427  }
2428 
2429  strcat(lDialogString, "--backtitle \"") ;
2430  strcat(lDialogString, "tab: move focus") ;
2431  if ( ! aDefaultInput )
2432  {
2433  strcat(lDialogString, " (sometimes nothing, no blink nor star, is shown in text field)") ;
2434  }
2435 
2436  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2437 
2438  if ( ! aDefaultInput )
2439  {
2440  strcat( lDialogString , "--insecure --passwordbox" ) ;
2441  }
2442  else
2443  {
2444  strcat( lDialogString , "--inputbox" ) ;
2445  }
2446  strcat( lDialogString , " \"" ) ;
2447  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
2448  {
2449  strcat(lDialogString, aMessage) ;
2450  }
2451  strcat(lDialogString,"\" 10 60 ") ;
2452  if ( aDefaultInput && strlen(aDefaultInput) )
2453  {
2454  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
2455  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultInput) ;
2456  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2457  }
2458 
2459  strcat(lDialogString, "2>>");
2460  strcpy(lDialogFile, getenv("TEMP"));
2461  strcat(lDialogFile, "\\tinyfd.txt");
2462  strcat(lDialogString, lDialogFile);
2463  strcat(lDialogString, " || echo 0 > ");
2464  strcat(lDialogString, lDialogFile);
2465 
2466  /* printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ; */
2467  system( lDialogString ) ;
2468 
2469  if (!(lIn = fopen(lDialogFile, "r")))
2470  {
2471  remove(lDialogFile);
2472  aoBuff[0] = '\0';
2473  return 0;
2474  }
2475  while (fgets(aoBuff, MAX_PATH_OR_CMD, lIn) != NULL)
2476  {}
2477  fclose(lIn);
2478 
2479  wipefile(lDialogFile);
2480  remove(lDialogFile);
2481  if ( aoBuff[strlen( aoBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
2482  {
2483  aoBuff[strlen( aoBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
2484  }
2485  /* printf( "aoBuff: %s\n" , aoBuff ) ; */
2486 
2487  /* printf( "aoBuff: %s len: %lu \n" , aoBuff , strlen(aoBuff) ) ; */
2488  lResult = strncmp( aoBuff , "1" , 1) ? 0 : 1 ;
2489  /* printf( "lResult: %d \n" , lResult ) ; */
2490  if ( ! lResult )
2491  {
2492  aoBuff[0] = '\0';
2493  return 0 ;
2494  }
2495  /* printf( "aoBuff+1: %s\n" , aoBuff+1 ) ; */
2496  strcpy(aoBuff, aoBuff+3);
2497  return 1;
2498 }
2499 
2500 
2501 static char * saveFileDialogWinConsole(
2502  char * aoBuff ,
2503  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
2504  char const * aDefaultPathAndFile ) /* NULL or "" */
2505 {
2506  char lDialogString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
2507  char lPathAndFile[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] = "";
2508  FILE * lIn;
2509 
2510  strcpy( lDialogString , "dialog " ) ;
2511  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
2512  {
2513  strcat(lDialogString, "--title \"") ;
2514  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
2515  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2516  }
2517 
2518  strcat(lDialogString, "--backtitle \"") ;
2519  strcat(lDialogString,
2520  "tab: focus | /: populate | spacebar: fill text field | ok: TEXT FIELD ONLY") ;
2521  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2522 
2523  strcat( lDialogString , "--fselect \"" ) ;
2524  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
2525  {
2526  /* dialog.exe uses unix separators even on windows */
2527  strcpy(lPathAndFile, aDefaultPathAndFile);
2528  replaceChr( lPathAndFile , '\\' , '/' ) ;
2529  }
2530 
2531  /* dialog.exe needs at least one separator */
2532  if ( ! strchr(lPathAndFile, '/') )
2533  {
2534  strcat(lDialogString, "./") ;
2535  }
2536  strcat(lDialogString, lPathAndFile) ;
2537  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 2>");
2538  strcpy(lPathAndFile, getenv("TEMP"));
2539  strcat(lPathAndFile, "\\tinyfd.txt");
2540  strcat(lDialogString, lPathAndFile);
2541 
2542  /* printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ; */
2543  system( lDialogString ) ;
2544 
2545  if (!(lIn = fopen(lPathAndFile, "r")))
2546  {
2547  remove(lPathAndFile);
2548  return NULL;
2549  }
2550  while (fgets(aoBuff, MAX_PATH_OR_CMD, lIn) != NULL)
2551  {}
2552  fclose(lIn);
2553  remove(lPathAndFile);
2554  replaceChr( aoBuff , '/' , '\\' ) ;
2555  /* printf( "aoBuff: %s\n" , aoBuff ) ; */
2556  getLastName(lDialogString,aoBuff);
2557  if ( ! strlen(lDialogString) )
2558  {
2559  return NULL;
2560  }
2561  return aoBuff;
2562 }
2563 
2564 
2565 static char * openFileDialogWinConsole(
2566  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
2567  char const * aDefaultPathAndFile ) /* NULL or "" */
2568 {
2569  char lFilterPatterns[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] = "";
2570  char lDialogString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
2571  FILE * lIn;
2572 
2573  static char aoBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
2574 
2575  strcpy( lDialogString , "dialog " ) ;
2576  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
2577  {
2578  strcat(lDialogString, "--title \"") ;
2579  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
2580  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2581  }
2582 
2583  strcat(lDialogString, "--backtitle \"") ;
2584  strcat(lDialogString,
2585  "tab: focus | /: populate | spacebar: fill text field | ok: TEXT FIELD ONLY") ;
2586  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2587 
2588  strcat( lDialogString , "--fselect \"" ) ;
2589  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
2590  {
2591  /* dialog.exe uses unix separators even on windows */
2592  strcpy(lFilterPatterns, aDefaultPathAndFile);
2593  replaceChr( lFilterPatterns , '\\' , '/' ) ;
2594  }
2595 
2596  /* dialog.exe needs at least one separator */
2597  if ( ! strchr(lFilterPatterns, '/') )
2598  {
2599  strcat(lDialogString, "./") ;
2600  }
2601  strcat(lDialogString, lFilterPatterns) ;
2602  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 2>");
2603  strcpy(lFilterPatterns, getenv("TEMP"));
2604  strcat(lFilterPatterns, "\\tinyfd.txt");
2605  strcat(lDialogString, lFilterPatterns);
2606 
2607  /* printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ; */
2608  system( lDialogString ) ;
2609 
2610  if (!(lIn = fopen(lFilterPatterns, "r")))
2611  {
2612  remove(lFilterPatterns);
2613  return NULL;
2614  }
2615  while (fgets(aoBuff, MAX_PATH_OR_CMD, lIn) != NULL)
2616  {}
2617  fclose(lIn);
2618  remove(lFilterPatterns);
2619  replaceChr( aoBuff , '/' , '\\' ) ;
2620  /* printf( "aoBuff: %s\n" , aoBuff ) ; */
2621  return aoBuff;
2622 }
2623 
2624 
2625 static char * selectFolderDialogWinConsole(
2626  char * aoBuff ,
2627  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
2628  char const * aDefaultPath ) /* NULL or "" */
2629 {
2630  char lDialogString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
2631  char lString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
2632  FILE * lIn ;
2633 
2634  strcpy( lDialogString , "dialog " ) ;
2635  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
2636  {
2637  strcat(lDialogString, "--title \"") ;
2638  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
2639  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2640  }
2641 
2642  strcat(lDialogString, "--backtitle \"") ;
2643  strcat(lDialogString,
2644  "tab: focus | /: populate | spacebar: fill text field | ok: TEXT FIELD ONLY") ;
2645  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
2646 
2647  strcat( lDialogString , "--dselect \"" ) ;
2648  if ( aDefaultPath && strlen(aDefaultPath) )
2649  {
2650  /* dialog.exe uses unix separators even on windows */
2651  strcpy(lString, aDefaultPath) ;
2652  ensureFinalSlash(lString);
2653  replaceChr( lString , '\\' , '/' ) ;
2654  strcat(lDialogString, lString) ;
2655  }
2656  else
2657  {
2658  /* dialog.exe needs at least one separator */
2659  strcat(lDialogString, "./") ;
2660  }
2661  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 2>");
2662  strcpy(lString, getenv("TEMP"));
2663  strcat(lString, "\\tinyfd.txt");
2664  strcat(lDialogString, lString);
2665 
2666  /* printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ; */
2667  system( lDialogString ) ;
2668 
2669  if (!(lIn = fopen(lString, "r")))
2670  {
2671  remove(lString);
2672  return NULL;
2673  }
2674  while (fgets(aoBuff, MAX_PATH_OR_CMD, lIn) != NULL)
2675  {}
2676  fclose(lIn);
2677  remove(lString);
2678  replaceChr( aoBuff , '/' , '\\' ) ;
2679  /* printf( "aoBuff: %s\n" , aoBuff ) ; */
2680  return aoBuff;
2681 }
2682 
2683 static void writeUtf8( char const * aUtf8String )
2684 {
2685  unsigned long lNum;
2686  void * lConsoleHandle;
2687  wchar_t * lTmpWChar;
2688 
2689  lConsoleHandle = GetStdHandle(STD_OUTPUT_HANDLE);
2690  lTmpWChar = tinyfd_utf8to16(aUtf8String);
2691  (void)WriteConsoleW(lConsoleHandle, lTmpWChar, (DWORD) wcslen(lTmpWChar), &lNum, NULL);
2692 }
2693 
2694 
2695 int tinyfd_messageBox(
2696  char const * aTitle, /* NULL or "" */
2697  char const * aMessage, /* NULL or "" may contain \n and \t */
2698  char const * aDialogType, /* "ok" "okcancel" "yesno" "yesnocancel" */
2699  char const * aIconType, /* "info" "warning" "error" "question" */
2700  int aDefaultButton) /* 0 for cancel/no , 1 for ok/yes , 2 for no in yesnocancel */
2701 {
2702  char lChar;
2703  UINT lOriginalCP = 0;
2704  UINT lOriginalOutputCP = 0;
2705 
2706  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_messageBox("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aMessage, aDialogType, aIconType, aDefaultButton);
2707  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aMessage)) return tinyfd_messageBox(aTitle, "INVALID MESSAGE WITH QUOTES", aDialogType, aIconType, aDefaultButton);
2708 
2709  if ((!tinyfd_forceConsole || !(GetConsoleWindow() || dialogPresent()))
2710  && (!getenv("SSH_CLIENT") || getenvDISPLAY()))
2711  {
2712  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "windows"); return 1; }
2713  return messageBoxWinGui(aTitle, aMessage, aDialogType, aIconType, aDefaultButton);
2714  }
2715  else if (dialogPresent())
2716  {
2717  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "dialog"); return 0; }
2718  return messageBoxWinConsole(
2719  aTitle, aMessage, aDialogType, aIconType, aDefaultButton);
2720  }
2721  else
2722  {
2723  if (!tinyfd_winUtf8)
2724  {
2725  lOriginalCP = GetConsoleCP();
2726  lOriginalOutputCP = GetConsoleOutputCP();
2727  (void)SetConsoleCP(GetACP());
2728  (void)SetConsoleOutputCP(GetACP());
2729  }
2730 
2731  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "basicinput"); return 0; }
2732  if (!gWarningDisplayed && !tinyfd_forceConsole)
2733  {
2734  gWarningDisplayed = 1;
2735  printf("\n\n%s\n", gTitle);
2736  printf("%s\n\n", tinyfd_needs);
2737  }
2738 
2739  if (aTitle && strlen(aTitle))
2740  {
2741  printf("\n");
2742  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) writeUtf8(aTitle);
2743  else printf("%s", aTitle);
2744  printf("\n\n");
2745  }
2746  if (aDialogType && !strcmp("yesno", aDialogType))
2747  {
2748  do
2749  {
2750  if (aMessage && strlen(aMessage))
2751  {
2752  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) writeUtf8(aMessage);
2753  else printf("%s", aMessage);
2754  printf("\n");
2755  }
2756  printf("y/n: ");
2757  lChar = (char)tolower(_getch());
2758  printf("\n\n");
2759  } while (lChar != 'y' && lChar != 'n');
2760  if (!tinyfd_winUtf8) { (void)SetConsoleCP(lOriginalCP); (void)SetConsoleOutputCP(lOriginalOutputCP); }
2761  return lChar == 'y' ? 1 : 0;
2762  }
2763  else if (aDialogType && !strcmp("okcancel", aDialogType))
2764  {
2765  do
2766  {
2767  if (aMessage && strlen(aMessage))
2768  {
2769  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) writeUtf8(aMessage);
2770  else printf("%s", aMessage);
2771  printf("\n");
2772  }
2773  printf("[O]kay/[C]ancel: ");
2774  lChar = (char)tolower(_getch());
2775  printf("\n\n");
2776  } while (lChar != 'o' && lChar != 'c');
2777  if (!tinyfd_winUtf8) { (void)SetConsoleCP(lOriginalCP); (void)SetConsoleOutputCP(lOriginalOutputCP); }
2778  return lChar == 'o' ? 1 : 0;
2779  }
2780  else if (aDialogType && !strcmp("yesnocancel", aDialogType))
2781  {
2782  do
2783  {
2784  if (aMessage && strlen(aMessage))
2785  {
2786  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) writeUtf8(aMessage);
2787  else printf("%s", aMessage);
2788  printf("\n");
2789  }
2790  printf("[Y]es/[N]o/[C]ancel: ");
2791  lChar = (char)tolower(_getch());
2792  printf("\n\n");
2793  } while (lChar != 'y' && lChar != 'n' && lChar != 'c');
2794  if (!tinyfd_winUtf8) { (void)SetConsoleCP(lOriginalCP); (void)SetConsoleOutputCP(lOriginalOutputCP); }
2795  return (lChar == 'y') ? 1 : (lChar == 'n') ? 2 : 0;
2796  }
2797  else
2798  {
2799  if (aMessage && strlen(aMessage))
2800  {
2801  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) writeUtf8(aMessage);
2802  else printf("%s", aMessage);
2803  printf("\n\n");
2804  }
2805  printf("press enter to continue ");
2806  lChar = (char)_getch();
2807  printf("\n\n");
2808  if (!tinyfd_winUtf8) { (void)SetConsoleCP(lOriginalCP); (void)SetConsoleOutputCP(lOriginalOutputCP); }
2809  return 1;
2810  }
2811  }
2812 }
2813 
2814 
2815 /* return has only meaning for tinyfd_query */
2816 int tinyfd_notifyPopup(
2817  char const * aTitle, /* NULL or "" */
2818  char const * aMessage , /* NULL or "" may contain \n \t */
2819  char const * aIconType ) /* "info" "warning" "error" */
2820 {
2821  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_notifyPopup("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aMessage, aIconType);
2822  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aMessage)) return tinyfd_notifyPopup(aTitle, "INVALID MESSAGE WITH QUOTES", aIconType);
2823 
2824  if ( powershellPresent() && (!tinyfd_forceConsole || !(
2825  GetConsoleWindow() ||
2826  dialogPresent()))
2827  && (!getenv("SSH_CLIENT") || getenvDISPLAY()))
2828  {
2829  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"windows");return 1;}
2830  return notifyWinGui(aTitle, aMessage, aIconType);
2831  }
2832  else
2833  return tinyfd_messageBox(aTitle, aMessage, "ok" , aIconType, 0);
2834 }
2835 
2836 
2837 /* returns NULL on cancel */
2838 char * tinyfd_inputBox(
2839  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
2840  char const * aMessage , /* NULL or "" (\n and \t have no effect) */
2841  char const * aDefaultInput ) /* "" , if NULL it's a passwordBox */
2842 {
2843  static char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] = "";
2844  char * lEOF;
2845 
2846  DWORD mode = 0;
2847  HANDLE hStdin = GetStdHandle(STD_INPUT_HANDLE);
2848 
2849  unsigned long lNum;
2850  void * lConsoleHandle;
2851  char * lTmpChar;
2852  wchar_t lBuffW[1024];
2853 
2854  UINT lOriginalCP = 0;
2855  UINT lOriginalOutputCP = 0;
2856 
2857  if (!aTitle && !aMessage && !aDefaultInput) return lBuff; /* now I can fill lBuff from outside */
2858 
2859  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_inputBox("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aMessage, aDefaultInput);
2860  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aMessage)) return tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, "INVALID MESSAGE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultInput);
2861  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultInput)) return tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, aMessage, "INVALID DEFAULT_INPUT WITH QUOTES");
2862 
2863  mode = 0;
2864  hStdin = GetStdHandle(STD_INPUT_HANDLE);
2865 
2866  if ((!tinyfd_forceConsole || !(
2867  GetConsoleWindow() ||
2868  dialogPresent()))
2869  && (!getenv("SSH_CLIENT") || getenvDISPLAY()))
2870  {
2871  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"windows");return (char *)1;}
2872  lBuff[0]='\0';
2873  if (inputBoxWinGui(lBuff, aTitle, aMessage, aDefaultInput)) return lBuff;
2874  else return NULL;
2875  }
2876  else if ( dialogPresent() )
2877  {
2878  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"dialog");return (char *)0;}
2879  lBuff[0]='\0';
2880  if (inputBoxWinConsole(lBuff, aTitle, aMessage, aDefaultInput) ) return lBuff;
2881  else return NULL;
2882  }
2883  else
2884  {
2885  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"basicinput");return (char *)0;}
2886  lBuff[0]='\0';
2887  if (!gWarningDisplayed && !tinyfd_forceConsole)
2888  {
2889  gWarningDisplayed = 1 ;
2890  printf("\n\n%s\n", gTitle);
2891  printf("%s\n\n", tinyfd_needs);
2892  }
2893 
2894  if (!tinyfd_winUtf8)
2895  {
2896  lOriginalCP = GetConsoleCP();
2897  lOriginalOutputCP = GetConsoleOutputCP();
2898  (void)SetConsoleCP(GetACP());
2899  (void)SetConsoleOutputCP(GetACP());
2900  }
2901 
2902  if (aTitle && strlen(aTitle))
2903  {
2904  printf("\n");
2905  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) writeUtf8(aTitle);
2906  else printf("%s", aTitle);
2907  printf("\n\n");
2908  }
2909  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
2910  {
2911  if (tinyfd_winUtf8) writeUtf8(aMessage);
2912  else printf("%s", aMessage);
2913  printf("\n");
2914  }
2915  printf("(ctrl-Z + enter to cancel): ");
2916  if ( ! aDefaultInput )
2917  {
2918  (void) GetConsoleMode(hStdin, &mode);
2919  (void) SetConsoleMode(hStdin, mode & (~ENABLE_ECHO_INPUT));
2920  }
2921  if (tinyfd_winUtf8)
2922  {
2923  lConsoleHandle = GetStdHandle(STD_INPUT_HANDLE);
2924  (void) ReadConsoleW(lConsoleHandle, lBuffW, MAX_PATH_OR_CMD, &lNum, NULL);
2925  if (!aDefaultInput)
2926  {
2927  (void)SetConsoleMode(hStdin, mode);
2928  printf("\n");
2929  }
2930  lBuffW[lNum] = '\0';
2931  if (lBuffW[wcslen(lBuffW) - 1] == '\n') lBuffW[wcslen(lBuffW) - 1] = '\0';
2932  if (lBuffW[wcslen(lBuffW) - 1] == '\r') lBuffW[wcslen(lBuffW) - 1] = '\0';
2933  lTmpChar = tinyfd_utf16to8(lBuffW);
2934  if (lTmpChar)
2935  {
2936  strcpy(lBuff, lTmpChar);
2937  return lBuff;
2938  }
2939  else
2940  return NULL;
2941  }
2942  else
2943  {
2944  lEOF = fgets(lBuff, MAX_PATH_OR_CMD, stdin);
2945  if (!aDefaultInput)
2946  {
2947  (void)SetConsoleMode(hStdin, mode);
2948  printf("\n");
2949  }
2950 
2951  if (!tinyfd_winUtf8)
2952  {
2953  (void)SetConsoleCP(lOriginalCP);
2954  (void)SetConsoleOutputCP(lOriginalOutputCP);
2955  }
2956 
2957  if (!lEOF)
2958  {
2959  return NULL;
2960  }
2961  printf("\n");
2962  if (strchr(lBuff, 27))
2963  {
2964  return NULL;
2965  }
2966  if (lBuff[strlen(lBuff) - 1] == '\n')
2967  {
2968  lBuff[strlen(lBuff) - 1] = '\0';
2969  }
2970  return lBuff;
2971  }
2972  }
2973 }
2974 
2975 
2976 char * tinyfd_saveFileDialog(
2977  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
2978  char const * aDefaultPathAndFile , /* NULL or "" */
2979  int aNumOfFilterPatterns , /* 0 */
2980  char const * const * aFilterPatterns , /* NULL or {"*.jpg","*.png"} */
2981  char const * aSingleFilterDescription ) /* NULL or "image files" */
2982 {
2983  static char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
2984  char lString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
2985  char * p ;
2986  char * lPointerInputBox;
2987  int i;
2988 
2989  lBuff[0]='\0';
2990 
2991  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_saveFileDialog("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription);
2992  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultPathAndFile)) return tinyfd_saveFileDialog(aTitle, "INVALID DEFAULT_PATH WITH QUOTES", aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription);
2993  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aSingleFilterDescription)) return tinyfd_saveFileDialog(aTitle, aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, "INVALID FILTER_DESCRIPTION WITH QUOTES");
2994  for (i = 0; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns; i++)
2995  {
2996  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aFilterPatterns[i])) return tinyfd_saveFileDialog("INVALID FILTER_PATTERN WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPathAndFile, 0, NULL, NULL);
2997  }
2998 
2999 
3000  if ( ( !tinyfd_forceConsole || !( GetConsoleWindow() || dialogPresent() ) )
3001  && (!getenv("SSH_CLIENT") || getenvDISPLAY()))
3002  {
3003  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"windows");return (char *)1;}
3004  p = saveFileDialogWinGui(lBuff,
3005  aTitle, aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns, (char const * const *)aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription);
3006  }
3007  else if (dialogPresent())
3008  {
3009  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "dialog"); return (char *)0; }
3010  p = saveFileDialogWinConsole(lBuff, aTitle, aDefaultPathAndFile);
3011  }
3012  else
3013  {
3014  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "basicinput"); return (char *)0; }
3015  strcpy(lBuff, "Save file in ");
3016  strcat(lBuff, getCurDir());
3017 
3018  lPointerInputBox = tinyfd_inputBox(NULL,NULL,NULL); /* obtain a pointer on the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
3019  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lString, lPointerInputBox); /* preserve the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
3020  p = tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, lBuff, "");
3021  if (p) strcpy(lBuff, p); else lBuff[0] = '\0';
3022  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lPointerInputBox, lString); /* restore its previous content to tinyfd_inputBox */
3023  p = lBuff;
3024  }
3025 
3026  if ( ! p || ! strlen( p ) )
3027  {
3028  return NULL;
3029  }
3030  getPathWithoutFinalSlash( lString , p ) ;
3031  if ( strlen( lString ) && ! dirExists( lString ) )
3032  {
3033  return NULL ;
3034  }
3035  getLastName(lString,p);
3036  if ( ! filenameValid(lString) )
3037  {
3038  return NULL;
3039  }
3040  return p ;
3041 }
3042 
3043 
3044 /* in case of multiple files, the separator is | */
3045 char * tinyfd_openFileDialog(
3046  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
3047  char const * aDefaultPathAndFile, /* NULL or "" */
3048  int aNumOfFilterPatterns , /* 0 */
3049  char const * const * aFilterPatterns, /* NULL or {"*.jpg","*.png"} */
3050  char const * aSingleFilterDescription, /* NULL or "image files" */
3051  int aAllowMultipleSelects ) /* 0 or 1 */
3052 {
3053  char lString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
3054  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
3055  char * p;
3056  char * lPointerInputBox;
3057  int i;
3058 
3059  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_openFileDialog("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription, aAllowMultipleSelects);
3060  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultPathAndFile)) return tinyfd_openFileDialog(aTitle, "INVALID DEFAULT_PATH WITH QUOTES", aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription, aAllowMultipleSelects);
3061  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aSingleFilterDescription)) return tinyfd_openFileDialog(aTitle, aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, "INVALID FILTER_DESCRIPTION WITH QUOTES", aAllowMultipleSelects);
3062  for (i = 0; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns; i++)
3063  {
3064  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aFilterPatterns[i])) return tinyfd_openFileDialog("INVALID FILTER_PATTERN WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPathAndFile, 0, NULL, NULL, aAllowMultipleSelects);
3065  }
3066 
3067  if ( ( !tinyfd_forceConsole || !( GetConsoleWindow() || dialogPresent() ) )
3068  && (!getenv("SSH_CLIENT") || getenvDISPLAY()))
3069  {
3070  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"windows");return (char *)1;}
3071  p = openFileDialogWinGui( aTitle, aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns,
3072  (char const * const *)aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription, aAllowMultipleSelects);
3073  }
3074  else if (dialogPresent())
3075  {
3076  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "dialog"); return (char *)0; }
3077  p = openFileDialogWinConsole(aTitle, aDefaultPathAndFile);
3078  }
3079  else
3080  {
3081  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "basicinput"); return (char *)0; }
3082  strcpy(lBuff, "Open file from ");
3083  strcat(lBuff, getCurDir());
3084  lPointerInputBox = tinyfd_inputBox(NULL, NULL, NULL); /* obtain a pointer on the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
3085  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lString, lPointerInputBox); /* preserve the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
3086  p = tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, lBuff, "");
3087  if (p) strcpy(lBuff, p); else lBuff[0] = '\0';
3088  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lPointerInputBox, lString); /* restore its previous content to tinyfd_inputBox */
3089  p = lBuff;
3090  }
3091 
3092  if ( ! p || ! strlen( p ) )
3093  {
3094  return NULL;
3095  }
3096  if ( aAllowMultipleSelects && strchr(p, '|') )
3097  {
3098  p = ensureFilesExist( (char *) p , p ) ;
3099  }
3100  else if ( ! fileExists(p) )
3101  {
3102  return NULL ;
3103  }
3104  /* printf( "lBuff3: %s\n" , p ) ; */
3105  return p ;
3106 }
3107 
3108 
3109 char * tinyfd_selectFolderDialog(
3110  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
3111  char const * aDefaultPath ) /* NULL or "" */
3112 {
3113  static char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
3114  char * p;
3115  char * lPointerInputBox;
3116  char lString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
3117 
3118  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_selectFolderDialog("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPath);
3119  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultPath)) return tinyfd_selectFolderDialog(aTitle, "INVALID DEFAULT_PATH WITH QUOTES");
3120 
3121  if ( ( !tinyfd_forceConsole || !( GetConsoleWindow() || dialogPresent() ) )
3122  && (!getenv("SSH_CLIENT") || getenvDISPLAY()))
3123  {
3124  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"windows");return (char *)1;}
3125  p = selectFolderDialogWinGui(lBuff, aTitle, aDefaultPath);
3126  }
3127  else
3128  if (dialogPresent())
3129  {
3130  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "dialog"); return (char *)0; }
3131  p = selectFolderDialogWinConsole(lBuff, aTitle, aDefaultPath);
3132  }
3133  else
3134  {
3135  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "basicinput"); return (char *)0; }
3136  strcpy(lBuff, "Select folder from ");
3137  strcat(lBuff, getCurDir());
3138  lPointerInputBox = tinyfd_inputBox(NULL, NULL, NULL); /* obtain a pointer on the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
3139  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lString, lPointerInputBox); /* preserve the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
3140  p = tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, lBuff, "");
3141  if (p) strcpy(lBuff, p); else lBuff[0] = '\0';
3142  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lPointerInputBox, lString); /* restore its previous content to tinyfd_inputBox */
3143  p = lBuff;
3144  }
3145 
3146  if ( ! p || ! strlen( p ) || ! dirExists( p ) )
3147  {
3148  return NULL ;
3149  }
3150  return p ;
3151 }
3152 
3153 
3154 /* returns the hexcolor as a string "#FF0000" */
3155 /* aoResultRGB also contains the result */
3156 /* aDefaultRGB is used only if aDefaultHexRGB is NULL */
3157 /* aDefaultRGB and aoResultRGB can be the same array */
3158 char * tinyfd_colorChooser(
3159  char const * aTitle, /* NULL or "" */
3160  char const * aDefaultHexRGB, /* NULL or "#FF0000"*/
3161  unsigned char const aDefaultRGB[3], /* { 0 , 255 , 255 } */
3162  unsigned char aoResultRGB[3]) /* { 0 , 0 , 0 } */
3163 {
3164  static char lDefaultHexRGB[16];
3165  int i;
3166  char * p ;
3167  char * lPointerInputBox;
3168  char lString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
3169 
3170  lDefaultHexRGB[0] = '\0';
3171 
3172  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_colorChooser("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultHexRGB, aDefaultRGB, aoResultRGB);
3173  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultHexRGB)) return tinyfd_colorChooser(aTitle, "INVALID DEFAULT_HEX_RGB WITH QUOTES", aDefaultRGB, aoResultRGB);
3174 
3175  if ( (!tinyfd_forceConsole || !( GetConsoleWindow() || dialogPresent()) )
3176  && (!getenv("SSH_CLIENT") || getenvDISPLAY()))
3177  {
3178  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"windows");return (char *)1;}
3179  p = colorChooserWinGui(aTitle, aDefaultHexRGB, aDefaultRGB, aoResultRGB);
3180  if (p)
3181  {
3182  strcpy(lDefaultHexRGB, p);
3183  return lDefaultHexRGB;
3184  }
3185  return NULL;
3186  }
3187  else if (dialogPresent())
3188  {
3189  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "dialog"); return (char *)0; }
3190  }
3191  else
3192  {
3193  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")){ strcpy(tinyfd_response, "basicinput"); return (char *)0; }
3194  }
3195 
3196  if (aDefaultHexRGB)
3197  {
3198  strncpy(lDefaultHexRGB, aDefaultHexRGB,7);
3199  lDefaultHexRGB[7]='\0';
3200  }
3201  else
3202  {
3203  RGB2Hex(aDefaultRGB, lDefaultHexRGB);
3204  }
3205 
3206  lPointerInputBox = tinyfd_inputBox(NULL, NULL, NULL); /* obtain a pointer on the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
3207  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lString, lPointerInputBox); /* preserve the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
3208  p = tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, "Enter hex rgb color (i.e. #f5ca20)", lDefaultHexRGB);
3209 
3210  if ( !p || (strlen(p) != 7) || (p[0] != '#') )
3211  {
3212  return NULL ;
3213  }
3214  for ( i = 1 ; i < 7 ; i ++ )
3215  {
3216  if ( ! isxdigit( (int) p[i] ) )
3217  {
3218  return NULL ;
3219  }
3220  }
3221  Hex2RGB(p,aoResultRGB);
3222 
3223  strcpy(lDefaultHexRGB, p);
3224 
3225  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lPointerInputBox, lString); /* restore its previous content to tinyfd_inputBox */
3226 
3227  return lDefaultHexRGB;
3228 }
3229 
3230 
3231 #else /* unix */
3232 
3233 static char gPython2Name[16];
3234 static char gPython3Name[16];
3235 static char gPythonName[16];
3236 
3237 int tfd_isDarwin(void)
3238 {
3239  static int lsIsDarwin = -1 ;
3240  struct utsname lUtsname ;
3241  if ( lsIsDarwin < 0 )
3242  {
3243  lsIsDarwin = !uname(&lUtsname) && !strcmp(lUtsname.sysname,"Darwin") ;
3244  }
3245  return lsIsDarwin ;
3246 }
3247 
3248 
3249 static int dirExists( char const * aDirPath )
3250 {
3251  DIR * lDir ;
3252  if ( ! aDirPath || ! strlen( aDirPath ) )
3253  return 0 ;
3254  lDir = opendir( aDirPath ) ;
3255  if ( ! lDir )
3256  {
3257  return 0 ;
3258  }
3259  closedir( lDir ) ;
3260  return 1 ;
3261 }
3262 
3263 
3264 static int detectPresence( char const * aExecutable )
3265 {
3266  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
3267  char lTestedString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] = "which " ;
3268  FILE * lIn ;
3269 #ifdef _GNU_SOURCE
3270  char* lAllocatedCharString;
3271  int lSubstringUndetected;
3272 #endif
3273 
3274  strcat( lTestedString , aExecutable ) ;
3275  strcat( lTestedString, " 2>/dev/null ");
3276  lIn = popen( lTestedString , "r" ) ;
3277  if ( ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
3278  && ( ! strchr( lBuff , ':' ) ) && ( strncmp(lBuff, "no ", 3) ) )
3279  { /* present */
3280  pclose( lIn ) ;
3281 
3282 #ifdef _GNU_SOURCE /*to bypass this, just comment out "#define _GNU_SOURCE" at the top of the file*/
3283  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' ) lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
3284  lAllocatedCharString = realpath(lBuff,NULL); /*same as canonicalize_file_name*/
3285  lSubstringUndetected = ! strstr(lAllocatedCharString, aExecutable);
3286  free(lAllocatedCharString);
3287  if (lSubstringUndetected)
3288  {
3289  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("detectPresence %s %d\n", aExecutable, 0);
3290  return 0;
3291  }
3292 #endif /*_GNU_SOURCE*/
3293 
3294  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("detectPresence %s %d\n", aExecutable, 1);
3295  return 1 ;
3296  }
3297  else
3298  {
3299  pclose( lIn ) ;
3300  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("detectPresence %s %d\n", aExecutable, 0);
3301  return 0 ;
3302  }
3303 }
3304 
3305 
3306 static char * getVersion( char const * aExecutable ) /*version must be first numeral*/
3307 {
3308  static char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
3309  char lTestedString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
3310  FILE * lIn ;
3311  char * lTmp ;
3312 
3313  strcpy( lTestedString , aExecutable ) ;
3314  strcat( lTestedString , " --version" ) ;
3315 
3316  lIn = popen( lTestedString , "r" ) ;
3317  lTmp = fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) ;
3318  pclose( lIn ) ;
3319 
3320  lTmp += strcspn(lTmp,"0123456789");
3321  /* printf("lTmp:%s\n", lTmp); */
3322  return lTmp ;
3323 }
3324 
3325 
3326 static int * getMajorMinorPatch( char const * aExecutable )
3327 {
3328  static int lArray[3] ;
3329  char * lTmp ;
3330 
3331  lTmp = (char *) getVersion(aExecutable);
3332  lArray[0] = atoi( strtok(lTmp," ,.-") ) ;
3333  /* printf("lArray0 %d\n", lArray[0]); */
3334  lArray[1] = atoi( strtok(0," ,.-") ) ;
3335  /* printf("lArray1 %d\n", lArray[1]); */
3336  lArray[2] = atoi( strtok(0," ,.-") ) ;
3337  /* printf("lArray2 %d\n", lArray[2]); */
3338 
3339  if ( !lArray[0] && !lArray[1] && !lArray[2] ) return NULL;
3340  return lArray ;
3341 }
3342 
3343 
3344 static int tryCommand( char const * aCommand )
3345 {
3346  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
3347  FILE * lIn ;
3348 
3349  lIn = popen( aCommand , "r" ) ;
3350  if ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) == NULL )
3351  { /* present */
3352  pclose( lIn ) ;
3353  return 1 ;
3354  }
3355  else
3356  {
3357  pclose( lIn ) ;
3358  return 0 ;
3359  }
3360 
3361 }
3362 
3363 
3364 static int isTerminalRunning(void)
3365 {
3366  static int lIsTerminalRunning = -1 ;
3367  if ( lIsTerminalRunning < 0 )
3368  {
3369  lIsTerminalRunning = isatty(1);
3370  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("isTerminalRunning %d\n", lIsTerminalRunning );
3371  }
3372  return lIsTerminalRunning;
3373 }
3374 
3375 
3376 static char * dialogNameOnly(void)
3377 {
3378  static char lDialogName[128] = "*" ;
3379  if ( lDialogName[0] == '*' )
3380  {
3381  if (!tinyfd_allowCursesDialogs)
3382  {
3383  strcpy(lDialogName , "" );
3384  }
3385  else if ( tfd_isDarwin() && * strcpy(lDialogName , "/opt/local/bin/dialog" )
3386  && detectPresence( lDialogName ) )
3387  {}
3388  else if ( * strcpy(lDialogName , "dialog" )
3389  && detectPresence( lDialogName ) )
3390  {}
3391  else
3392  {
3393  strcpy(lDialogName , "" );
3394  }
3395  }
3396  return lDialogName ;
3397 }
3398 
3399 
3400 int isDialogVersionBetter09b(void)
3401 {
3402  char const * lDialogName ;
3403  char * lVersion ;
3404  int lMajor ;
3405  int lMinor ;
3406  int lDate ;
3407  int lResult ;
3408  char * lMinorP ;
3409  char * lLetter ;
3410  char lBuff[128] ;
3411 
3412  /*char lTest[128] = " 0.9b-20031126" ;*/
3413 
3414  lDialogName = dialogNameOnly() ;
3415  if ( ! strlen(lDialogName) || !(lVersion = (char *) getVersion(lDialogName)) ) return 0 ;
3416  /*lVersion = lTest ;*/
3417  /*printf("lVersion %s\n", lVersion);*/
3418  strcpy(lBuff,lVersion);
3419  lMajor = atoi( strtok(lVersion," ,.-") ) ;
3420  /*printf("lMajor %d\n", lMajor);*/
3421  lMinorP = strtok(0," ,.-abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvxyz");
3422  lMinor = atoi( lMinorP ) ;
3423  /*printf("lMinor %d\n", lMinor );*/
3424  lDate = atoi( strtok(0," ,.-") ) ;
3425  if (lDate<0) lDate = - lDate;
3426  /*printf("lDate %d\n", lDate);*/
3427  lLetter = lMinorP + strlen(lMinorP) ;
3428  strcpy(lVersion,lBuff);
3429  strtok(lLetter," ,.-");
3430  /*printf("lLetter %s\n", lLetter);*/
3431  lResult = (lMajor > 0) || ( ( lMinor == 9 ) && (*lLetter == 'b') && (lDate >= 20031126) );
3432  /*printf("lResult %d\n", lResult);*/
3433  return lResult;
3434 }
3435 
3436 
3437 static int whiptailPresentOnly(void)
3438 {
3439  static int lWhiptailPresent = -1 ;
3440  if (!tinyfd_allowCursesDialogs) return 0;
3441  if ( lWhiptailPresent < 0 )
3442  {
3443  lWhiptailPresent = detectPresence( "whiptail" ) ;
3444  }
3445  return lWhiptailPresent ;
3446 }
3447 
3448 
3449 static char * terminalName(void)
3450 {
3451  static char lTerminalName[128] = "*" ;
3452  char lShellName[64] = "*" ;
3453  int * lArray;
3454 
3455  if ( lTerminalName[0] == '*' )
3456  {
3457  if ( detectPresence( "bash" ) )
3458  {
3459  strcpy(lShellName , "bash -c " ) ; /*good for basic input*/
3460  }
3461  else if ( strlen(dialogNameOnly()) || whiptailPresentOnly() )
3462  {
3463  strcpy(lShellName , "sh -c " ) ; /*good enough for dialog & whiptail*/
3464  }
3465  else
3466  {
3467  strcpy(lTerminalName , "" ) ;
3468  return NULL ;
3469  }
3470 
3471  if ( tfd_isDarwin() )
3472  {
3473  if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName , "/opt/X11/bin/xterm" )
3474  && detectPresence( lTerminalName ) )
3475  {
3476  strcat(lTerminalName , " -fa 'DejaVu Sans Mono' -fs 10 -title tinyfiledialogs -e " ) ;
3477  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3478  }
3479  else
3480  {
3481  strcpy(lTerminalName , "" ) ;
3482  }
3483  }
3484  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"xterm") /*good (small without parameters)*/
3485  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3486  {
3487  strcat(lTerminalName , " -fa 'DejaVu Sans Mono' -fs 10 -title tinyfiledialogs -e " ) ;
3488  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3489  }
3490  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"terminator") /*good*/
3491  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3492  {
3493  strcat(lTerminalName , " -x " ) ;
3494  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3495  }
3496  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"lxterminal") /*good*/
3497  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3498  {
3499  strcat(lTerminalName , " -e " ) ;
3500  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3501  }
3502  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"konsole") /*good*/
3503  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3504  {
3505  strcat(lTerminalName , " -e " ) ;
3506  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3507  }
3508  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"kterm") /*good*/
3509  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3510  {
3511  strcat(lTerminalName , " -e " ) ;
3512  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3513  }
3514  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"tilix") /*good*/
3515  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3516  {
3517  strcat(lTerminalName , " -e " ) ;
3518  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3519  }
3520  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"xfce4-terminal") /*good*/
3521  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3522  {
3523  strcat(lTerminalName , " -x " ) ;
3524  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3525  }
3526  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"mate-terminal") /*good*/
3527  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3528  {
3529  strcat(lTerminalName , " -x " ) ;
3530  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3531  }
3532  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"Eterm") /*good*/
3533  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3534  {
3535  strcat(lTerminalName , " -e " ) ;
3536  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3537  }
3538  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"evilvte") /*good*/
3539  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3540  {
3541  strcat(lTerminalName , " -e " ) ;
3542  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3543  }
3544  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"pterm") /*good (only letters)*/
3545  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) )
3546  {
3547  strcat(lTerminalName , " -e " ) ;
3548  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3549  }
3550  else if ( * strcpy(lTerminalName,"gnome-terminal")
3551  && detectPresence(lTerminalName) && (lArray = getMajorMinorPatch(lTerminalName))
3552  && ((lArray[0]<3) || (lArray[0]==3 && lArray[1]<=6)) )
3553  {
3554  strcat(lTerminalName , " --disable-factory -x " ) ;
3555  strcat(lTerminalName , lShellName ) ;
3556  }
3557  else
3558  {
3559  strcpy(lTerminalName , "" ) ;
3560  }
3561  /* bad: koi rxterm guake tilda vala-terminal qterminal
3562  aterm Terminal terminology sakura lilyterm weston-terminal
3563  roxterm termit xvt rxvt mrxvt urxvt */
3564  }
3565  if ( strlen(lTerminalName) )
3566  {
3567  return lTerminalName ;
3568  }
3569  else
3570  {
3571  return NULL ;
3572  }
3573 }
3574 
3575 
3576 static char * dialogName(void)
3577 {
3578  char * lDialogName ;
3579  lDialogName = dialogNameOnly( ) ;
3580  if ( strlen(lDialogName) && ( isTerminalRunning() || terminalName() ) )
3581  {
3582  return lDialogName ;
3583  }
3584  else
3585  {
3586  return NULL ;
3587  }
3588 }
3589 
3590 
3591 static int whiptailPresent(void)
3592 {
3593  int lWhiptailPresent ;
3594  lWhiptailPresent = whiptailPresentOnly( ) ;
3595  if ( lWhiptailPresent && ( isTerminalRunning() || terminalName() ) )
3596  {
3597  return lWhiptailPresent ;
3598  }
3599  else
3600  {
3601  return 0 ;
3602  }
3603 }
3604 
3605 
3606 
3607 static int graphicMode(void)
3608 {
3609  return !( tinyfd_forceConsole && (isTerminalRunning() || terminalName()) )
3610  && ( getenvDISPLAY()
3611  || (tfd_isDarwin() && (!getenv("SSH_TTY") || getenvDISPLAY() ) ) ) ;
3612 }

3615 static int pactlPresent(void)
3616 {
3617  static int lPactlPresent = -1 ;
3618  if ( lPactlPresent < 0 )
3619  {
3620  lPactlPresent = detectPresence("pactl") ;
3621  }
3622  return lPactlPresent ;
3623 }

3625 
3626 static int speakertestPresent(void)
3627 {
3628  static int lSpeakertestPresent = -1 ;
3629  if ( lSpeakertestPresent < 0 )
3630  {
3631  lSpeakertestPresent = detectPresence("speaker-test") ;
3632  }
3633  return lSpeakertestPresent ;
3634 }
3635 
3636 
3637 static int playPresent()
3638 {
3639  static int lPlayPresent = -1;
3640  if (lPlayPresent < 0)
3641  {
3642  lPlayPresent = detectPresence("sox"); /*if sox is present, play is ready*/
3643  }
3644  return lPlayPresent;
3645 }

3714 static int perlPresent(void)
3715 {
3716  static int lPerlPresent = -1 ;
3717  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
3718  FILE * lIn ;
3719 
3720  if ( lPerlPresent < 0 )
3721  {
3722  lPerlPresent = detectPresence("perl") ;
3723  if (lPerlPresent)
3724  {
3725  lIn = popen("perl -MNet::DBus -e \"Net::DBus->session->get_service('org.freedesktop.Notifications')\" 2>&1", "r");
3726  if (fgets(lBuff, sizeof(lBuff), lIn) == NULL)
3727  {
3728  lPerlPresent = 2;
3729  }
3730  pclose(lIn);
3731  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("perl-dbus %d\n", lPerlPresent);
3732  }
3733  }
3734  return graphicMode() ? lPerlPresent : 0 ;
3735 }

3745  {

3749  lIn = popen( "test -e /System/Library/Sounds/Ping.aiff || echo Ping" , "r" ) ;
3750  if ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) == NULL )
3751  {
3752  lAfplayPresent = 2 ;
3753  }
3754  pclose( lIn ) ;
3755  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("afplay %d\n", lAfplayPresent);
3756  }
3757  }

3861 
3862 int tfd_zenity3Present(void)
3863 {
3864  static int lZenity3Present = -1 ;
3865  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
3866  FILE * lIn ;
3867  int lIntTmp ;
3868 
3869  if ( lZenity3Present < 0 )
3870  {
3871  lZenity3Present = 0 ;
3872  if ( tfd_zenityPresent() )
3873  {
3874  lIn = popen( "zenity --version" , "r" ) ;
3875  if ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
3876  {
3877  if ( atoi(lBuff) >= 3 )
3878  {
3879  lZenity3Present = 3 ;
3880  lIntTmp = atoi(strtok(lBuff,".")+2 ) ;
3881  if ( lIntTmp >= 18 )
3882  {
3883  lZenity3Present = 5 ;
3884  }
3885  else if ( lIntTmp >= 10 )
3886  {
3887  lZenity3Present = 4 ;
3888  }
3889  }
3890  else if ( ( atoi(lBuff) == 2 ) && ( atoi(strtok(lBuff,".")+2 ) >= 32 ) )
3891  {
3892  lZenity3Present = 2 ;
3893  }
3894  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("zenity type %d\n", lZenity3Present);
3895  }
3896  pclose( lIn ) ;
3897  }
3898  }
3899  return graphicMode() ? lZenity3Present : 0 ;
3900 }
3901 
3902 
3903 int tfd_kdialogPresent(void)
3904 {
3905  static int lKdialogPresent = -1 ;
3906  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
3907  FILE * lIn ;
3908  char * lDesktop;
3909 
3910  if ( lKdialogPresent < 0 )
3911  {
3912  if ( tfd_zenityPresent() )
3913  {
3914  lDesktop = getenv("XDG_SESSION_DESKTOP");
3915  if ( !lDesktop || ( strcmp(lDesktop, "KDE") && strcmp(lDesktop, "lxqt") ) )
3916  {
3917  lKdialogPresent = 0 ;
3918  return lKdialogPresent ;
3919  }
3920  }
3921 
3922  lKdialogPresent = detectPresence("kdialog") ;
3923  if ( lKdialogPresent && !getenv("SSH_TTY") )
3924  {
3925  lIn = popen( "kdialog --attach 2>&1" , "r" ) ;
3926  if ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
3927  {
3928  if ( ! strstr( "Unknown" , lBuff ) )
3929  {
3930  lKdialogPresent = 2 ;
3931  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("kdialog-attach %d\n", lKdialogPresent);
3932  }
3933  }
3934  pclose( lIn ) ;
3935 
3936  if (lKdialogPresent == 2)
3937  {
3938  lKdialogPresent = 1 ;
3939  lIn = popen( "kdialog --passivepopup 2>&1" , "r" ) ;
3940  if ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
3941  {
3942  if ( ! strstr( "Unknown" , lBuff ) )
3943  {
3944  lKdialogPresent = 2 ;
3945  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("kdialog-popup %d\n", lKdialogPresent);
3946  }
3947  }
3948  pclose( lIn ) ;
3949  }
3950  }
3951  }
3952  return graphicMode() ? lKdialogPresent : 0 ;
3953 }
3954 
3955 
3956 static int osx9orBetter(void)
3957 {
3958  static int lOsx9orBetter = -1 ;
3959  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
3960  FILE * lIn ;
3961  int V,v;
3962 
3963  if ( lOsx9orBetter < 0 )
3964  {
3965  lOsx9orBetter = 0 ;
3966  lIn = popen( "osascript -e 'set osver to system version of (system info)'" , "r" ) ;
3967  if ( ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
3968  && ( 2 == sscanf(lBuff, "%d.%d", &V, &v) ) )
3969  {
3970  V = V * 100 + v;
3971  if ( V >= 1009 )
3972  {
3973  lOsx9orBetter = 1 ;
3974  }
3975  }
3976  pclose( lIn ) ;
3977  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("Osx10 = %d, %d = %s\n", lOsx9orBetter, V, lBuff) ;
3978  }
3979  return lOsx9orBetter ;
3980 }
3981 
3982 
3983 static int python3Present(void)
3984 {
3985  static int lPython3Present = -1 ;
3986  int i;
3987 
3988  if ( lPython3Present < 0 )
3989  {
3990  lPython3Present = 0 ;
3991  strcpy(gPython3Name , "python3" ) ;
3992  if ( detectPresence(gPython3Name) ) lPython3Present = 1;
3993  else
3994  {
3995  for ( i = 9 ; i >= 0 ; i -- )
3996  {
3997  sprintf( gPython3Name , "python3.%d" , i ) ;
3998  if ( detectPresence(gPython3Name) )
3999  {
4000  lPython3Present = 1;
4001  break;
4002  }
4003  }
4004  }
4005  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("lPython3Present %d\n", lPython3Present) ;
4006  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("gPython3Name %s\n", gPython3Name) ;
4007  }
4008  return lPython3Present ;
4009 }
4010 
4011 
4012 static int python2Present(void)
4013 {
4014  static int lPython2Present = -1 ;
4015  int i;
4016 
4017  if ( lPython2Present < 0 )
4018  {
4019  lPython2Present = 0 ;
4020  strcpy(gPython2Name , "python2" ) ;
4021  if ( detectPresence(gPython2Name) ) lPython2Present = 1;
4022  else
4023  {
4024  for ( i = 9 ; i >= 0 ; i -- )
4025  {
4026  sprintf( gPython2Name , "python2.%d" , i ) ;
4027  if ( detectPresence(gPython2Name) )
4028  {
4029  lPython2Present = 1;
4030  break;
4031  }
4032  }
4033  }
4034  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("lPython2Present %d\n", lPython2Present) ;
4035  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("gPython2Name %s\n", gPython2Name) ;
4036  }
4037  return lPython2Present ;
4038 }

4040 
4041 static int tkinter3Present(void)
4042 {
4043  static int lTkinter3Present = -1 ;
4044  char lPythonCommand[256];
4045  char lPythonParams[128] =
4046  "-S -c \"try:\n\timport tkinter;\nexcept:\n\tprint(0);\"";
4047 
4048  if ( lTkinter3Present < 0 )
4049  {
4050  lTkinter3Present = 0 ;
4051  if ( python3Present() )
4052  {
4053  sprintf( lPythonCommand , "%s %s" , gPython3Name , lPythonParams ) ;
4054  lTkinter3Present = tryCommand(lPythonCommand) ;
4055  }
4056  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("lTkinter3Present %d\n", lTkinter3Present) ;
4057  }
4058  return lTkinter3Present && graphicMode() && !(tfd_isDarwin() && getenv("SSH_TTY") );
4059 }
4060 
4061 
4062 static int tkinter2Present(void)
4063 {
4064  static int lTkinter2Present = -1 ;
4065  char lPythonCommand[256];
4066  char lPythonParams[128] =
4067  "-S -c \"try:\n\timport Tkinter;\nexcept:\n\tprint 0;\"";
4068 
4069  if ( lTkinter2Present < 0 )
4070  {
4071  lTkinter2Present = 0 ;
4072  if ( python2Present() )
4073  {
4074  sprintf( lPythonCommand , "%s %s" , gPython2Name , lPythonParams ) ;
4075  lTkinter2Present = tryCommand(lPythonCommand) ;
4076  }
4077  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("lTkinter2Present %d\n", lTkinter2Present) ;
4078  }
4079  return lTkinter2Present && graphicMode() && !(tfd_isDarwin() && getenv("SSH_TTY") );
4080 }

4082 
4083 static int pythonDbusPresent(void)
4084 {
4085  static int lPythonDbusPresent = -1 ;
4086  char lPythonCommand[384];
4087  char lPythonParams[256] =
4088 "-c \"try:\n\timport dbus;bus=dbus.SessionBus();\
4089 notif=bus.get_object('org.freedesktop.Notifications','/org/freedesktop/Notifications');\
4090 notify=dbus.Interface(notif,'org.freedesktop.Notifications');\nexcept:\n\tprint(0);\"";
4091 
4092  if (lPythonDbusPresent < 0 )
4093  {
4094  lPythonDbusPresent = 0 ;
4095  if ( python2Present() )
4096  {
4097  strcpy(gPythonName , gPython2Name ) ;
4098  sprintf( lPythonCommand , "%s %s" , gPythonName , lPythonParams ) ;
4099  lPythonDbusPresent = tryCommand(lPythonCommand) ;
4100  }
4101 
4102  if ( !lPythonDbusPresent && python3Present() )
4103  {
4104  strcpy(gPythonName , gPython3Name ) ;
4105  sprintf( lPythonCommand , "%s %s" , gPythonName , lPythonParams ) ;
4106  lPythonDbusPresent = tryCommand(lPythonCommand) ;
4107  }
4108 
4109  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("lPythonDbusPresent %d\n", lPythonDbusPresent) ;
4110  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("gPythonName %s\n", gPythonName) ;
4111  }
4112  return lPythonDbusPresent && graphicMode() && !(tfd_isDarwin() && getenv("SSH_TTY") );
4113 }
4114 
4115 
4116 static void sigHandler(int signum)
4117 {
4118  FILE * lIn ;
4119  if ( ( lIn = popen( "pactl unload-module module-sine" , "r" ) ) )
4120  {
4121  pclose( lIn ) ;
4122  }
4123  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf("tinyfiledialogs caught signal %d\n", signum);
4124 }
4125 
4126 void tinyfd_beep(void)
4127 {
4128  char lDialogString[256] ;
4129  FILE * lIn ;
4130 
4131  if ( osascriptPresent() )
4132  {
4133  if ( afplayPresent() >= 2 )
4134  {
4135  strcpy( lDialogString , "afplay /System/Library/Sounds/Ping.aiff") ;
4136  }
4137  else
4138  {
4139  strcpy( lDialogString , "osascript -e 'tell application \"System Events\" to beep'") ;
4140  }
4141  }
4142  else if ( pactlPresent() )
4143  {
4144  signal(SIGINT, sigHandler);
4145  /*strcpy( lDialogString , "pactl load-module module-sine frequency=440;sleep .3;pactl unload-module module-sine" ) ;*/
4146  strcpy( lDialogString , "thnum=$(pactl load-module module-sine frequency=440);sleep .3;pactl unload-module $thnum" ) ;
4147  }
4148  else if ( speakertestPresent() )
4149  {
4150  /*strcpy( lDialogString , "timeout -k .3 .3 speaker-test --frequency 440 --test sine > /dev/tty" ) ;*/
4151  strcpy( lDialogString , "( speaker-test -t sine -f 440 > /dev/tty )& pid=$!;sleep .4; kill -9 $pid" ) ; /*.3 was too short for mac g3*/
4152  }
4153  else if (beepexePresent())
4154  {
4155  strcpy(lDialogString, "beep.exe 440 300");
4156  }
4157  else if (playPresent()) /* play is part of sox */
4158  {
4159  strcpy(lDialogString, "play -q -n synth .3 sine 440");
4160  }
4161  else if ( beepPresent() )
4162  {
4163  strcpy( lDialogString , "beep -f 440 -l 300" ) ;
4164  }
4165  else
4166  {
4167  strcpy( lDialogString , "printf '\a' > /dev/tty" ) ;
4168  }
4169 
4170  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ;
4171 
4172  if ( ( lIn = popen( lDialogString , "r" ) ) )
4173  {
4174  pclose( lIn ) ;
4175  }
4176 
4177  if ( pactlPresent() )
4178  {
4179  signal(SIGINT, SIG_DFL);
4180  }
4181 }
4182 
4183 
4184 int tinyfd_messageBox(
4185  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
4186  char const * aMessage , /* NULL or "" may contain \n and \t */
4187  char const * aDialogType , /* "ok" "okcancel" "yesno" "yesnocancel" */
4188  char const * aIconType , /* "info" "warning" "error" "question" */
4189  int aDefaultButton ) /* 0 for cancel/no , 1 for ok/yes , 2 for no in yesnocancel */
4190 {
4191  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
4192  char * lDialogString = NULL ;
4193  char * lpDialogString;
4194  FILE * lIn ;
4195  int lWasGraphicDialog = 0 ;
4196  int lWasXterm = 0 ;
4197  int lResult ;
4198  char lChar ;
4199  struct termios infoOri;
4200  struct termios info;
4201  size_t lTitleLen ;
4202  size_t lMessageLen ;
4203 
4204  lBuff[0]='\0';
4205 
4206  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_messageBox("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aMessage, aDialogType, aIconType, aDefaultButton);
4207  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aMessage)) return tinyfd_messageBox(aTitle, "INVALID MESSAGE WITH QUOTES", aDialogType, aIconType, aDefaultButton);
4208 
4209  lTitleLen = aTitle ? strlen(aTitle) : 0 ;
4210  lMessageLen = aMessage ? strlen(aMessage) : 0 ;
4211  if ( !aTitle || strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query") )
4212  {
4213  lDialogString = (char *) malloc( MAX_PATH_OR_CMD + lTitleLen + lMessageLen );
4214  }
4215 
4216  if ( osascriptPresent( ) )
4217  {
4218  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"applescript");return 1;}
4219 
4220  strcpy( lDialogString , "osascript ");
4221  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'tell application \"System Events\"' -e 'Activate'");
4222  strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'try' -e 'set {vButton} to {button returned} of ( display dialog \"") ;
4223  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
4224  {
4225  strcat(lDialogString, aMessage) ;
4226  }
4227  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
4228  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
4229  {
4230  strcat(lDialogString, "with title \"") ;
4231  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
4232  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
4233  }
4234  strcat(lDialogString, "with icon ") ;
4235  if ( aIconType && ! strcmp( "error" , aIconType ) )
4236  {
4237  strcat(lDialogString, "stop " ) ;
4238  }
4239  else if ( aIconType && ! strcmp( "warning" , aIconType ) )
4240  {
4241  strcat(lDialogString, "caution " ) ;
4242  }
4243  else /* question or info */
4244  {
4245  strcat(lDialogString, "note " ) ;
4246  }
4247  if ( aDialogType && ! strcmp( "okcancel" , aDialogType ) )
4248  {
4249  if ( ! aDefaultButton )
4250  {
4251  strcat( lDialogString ,"default button \"Cancel\" " ) ;
4252  }
4253  }
4254  else if ( aDialogType && ! strcmp( "yesno" , aDialogType ) )
4255  {
4256  strcat( lDialogString ,"buttons {\"No\", \"Yes\"} " ) ;
4257  if (aDefaultButton)
4258  {
4259  strcat( lDialogString ,"default button \"Yes\" " ) ;
4260  }
4261  else
4262  {
4263  strcat( lDialogString ,"default button \"No\" " ) ;
4264  }
4265  strcat( lDialogString ,"cancel button \"No\"" ) ;
4266  }
4267  else if ( aDialogType && ! strcmp( "yesnocancel" , aDialogType ) )
4268  {
4269  strcat( lDialogString ,"buttons {\"No\", \"Yes\", \"Cancel\"} " ) ;
4270  switch (aDefaultButton)
4271  {
4272  case 1: strcat( lDialogString ,"default button \"Yes\" " ) ; break;
4273  case 2: strcat( lDialogString ,"default button \"No\" " ) ; break;
4274  case 0: strcat( lDialogString ,"default button \"Cancel\" " ) ; break;
4275  }
4276  strcat( lDialogString ,"cancel button \"Cancel\"" ) ;
4277  }
4278  else
4279  {
4280  strcat( lDialogString ,"buttons {\"OK\"} " ) ;
4281  strcat( lDialogString ,"default button \"OK\" " ) ;
4282  }
4283  strcat( lDialogString, ")' ") ;
4284 
4285  strcat( lDialogString,
4286 "-e 'if vButton is \"Yes\" then' -e 'return 1'\
4287  -e 'else if vButton is \"OK\" then' -e 'return 1'\
4288  -e 'else if vButton is \"No\" then' -e 'return 2'\
4289  -e 'else' -e 'return 0' -e 'end if' " );
4290 
4291  strcat( lDialogString, "-e 'on error number -128' " ) ;
4292  strcat( lDialogString, "-e '0' " );
4293 
4294  strcat( lDialogString, "-e 'end try'") ;
4295  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString, " -e 'end tell'") ;
4296  }
4297  else if ( tfd_kdialogPresent() )
4298  {
4299  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"kdialog");return 1;}
4300 
4301  strcpy( lDialogString , "kdialog" ) ;

4305  }
4306 
4307  strcat( lDialogString , " --" ) ;
4308  if ( aDialogType && ( ! strcmp( "okcancel" , aDialogType )
4309  || ! strcmp( "yesno" , aDialogType ) || ! strcmp( "yesnocancel" , aDialogType ) ) )
4310  {
4311  if ( aIconType && ( ! strcmp( "warning" , aIconType )
4312  || ! strcmp( "error" , aIconType ) ) )

4315  }

4319  }

4321  {

4323  }
4324  }

4326  {

4328  }

4332  }

4335  strcat( lDialogString , "msgbox" ) ;
4336  }
4337  strcat( lDialogString , " \"" ) ;
4338  if ( aMessage )
4339  {
4340  strcat( lDialogString , aMessage ) ;
4341  }
4342  strcat( lDialogString , "\"" ) ;

4344  {

4346  " --yes-label Ok --no-label Cancel" ) ;
4347  }

4353  }

4358  }

4362  }
4363  }

4874  }
4875  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ");
4876 
4877  if ( lWasGraphicDialog )
4878  {
4879  if (aDialogType && !strcmp("yesnocancel", aDialogType))
4880  {
4881  strcat(lDialogString,"0 60 0 Yes \"\" No \"\") 2>/tmp/tinyfd.txt;\
4882 if [ $? = 0 ];then tinyfdBool=1;else tinyfdBool=0;fi;\
4883 tinyfdRes=$(cat /tmp/tinyfd.txt);echo $tinyfdBool$tinyfdRes") ;
4884  }
4885  else
4886  {
4887  strcat(lDialogString,
4888  "10 60 ) 2>&1;if [ $? = 0 ];then echo 1;else echo 0;fi");
4889  }
4890  }
4891  else
4892  {
4893  if (aDialogType && !strcmp("yesnocancel", aDialogType))
4894  {
4895  strcat(lDialogString,"0 60 0 Yes \"\" No \"\" >/dev/tty ) 2>/tmp/tinyfd.txt;\
4896  if [ $? = 0 ];then tinyfdBool=1;else tinyfdBool=0;fi;\
4897  tinyfdRes=$(cat /tmp/tinyfd.txt);echo $tinyfdBool$tinyfdRes") ;
4898 
4899  if ( lWasXterm )
4900  {
4901  strcat(lDialogString," >/tmp/tinyfd0.txt';cat /tmp/tinyfd0.txt");
4902  }
4903  else
4904  {
4905  strcat(lDialogString, "; clear >/dev/tty") ;
4906  }
4907  }
4908  else
4909  {
4910  strcat(lDialogString, "10 60 >/dev/tty) 2>&1;if [ $? = 0 ];");
4911  if ( lWasXterm )
4912  {
4913  strcat( lDialogString ,
4914 "then\n\techo 1\nelse\n\techo 0\nfi >/tmp/tinyfd.txt';cat /tmp/tinyfd.txt;rm /tmp/tinyfd.txt");
4915  }
4916  else
4917  {
4918  strcat(lDialogString,
4919  "then echo 1;else echo 0;fi;clear >/dev/tty");
4920  }
4921  }
4922  }
4923  }
4924  else if ( !isTerminalRunning() && terminalName() )
4925  {
4926  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"basicinput");return 0;}
4927  strcpy( lDialogString , terminalName() ) ;
4928  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
4929  if ( !gWarningDisplayed && !tinyfd_forceConsole)
4930  {
4931  gWarningDisplayed = 1 ;
4932  strcat( lDialogString , "echo \"" ) ;
4933  strcat( lDialogString, gTitle) ;
4934  strcat( lDialogString , "\";" ) ;
4935  strcat( lDialogString , "echo \"" ) ;
4936  strcat( lDialogString, tinyfd_needs) ;
4937  strcat( lDialogString , "\";echo;echo;" ) ;
4938  }
4939  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
4940  {
4941  strcat( lDialogString , "echo \"" ) ;
4942  strcat( lDialogString, aTitle) ;
4943  strcat( lDialogString , "\";echo;" ) ;
4944  }
4945  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
4946  {
4947  strcat( lDialogString , "echo \"" ) ;
4948  strcat( lDialogString, aMessage) ;
4949  strcat( lDialogString , "\"; " ) ;
4950  }
4951  if ( aDialogType && !strcmp("yesno",aDialogType) )
4952  {
4953  strcat( lDialogString , "echo -n \"y/n: \"; " ) ;
4954  strcat( lDialogString , "stty sane -echo;" ) ;
4955  strcat( lDialogString ,
4956  "answer=$( while ! head -c 1 | grep -i [ny];do true ;done);");
4957  strcat( lDialogString ,
4958  "if echo \"$answer\" | grep -iq \"^y\";then\n");
4959  strcat( lDialogString , "\techo 1\nelse\n\techo 0\nfi" ) ;
4960  }
4961  else if ( aDialogType && !strcmp("okcancel",aDialogType) )
4962  {
4963  strcat( lDialogString , "echo -n \"[O]kay/[C]ancel: \"; " ) ;
4964  strcat( lDialogString , "stty sane -echo;" ) ;
4965  strcat( lDialogString ,
4966  "answer=$( while ! head -c 1 | grep -i [oc];do true ;done);");
4967  strcat( lDialogString ,
4968  "if echo \"$answer\" | grep -iq \"^o\";then\n");
4969  strcat( lDialogString , "\techo 1\nelse\n\techo 0\nfi" ) ;
4970  }
4971  else if ( aDialogType && !strcmp("yesnocancel",aDialogType) )
4972  {
4973  strcat( lDialogString , "echo -n \"[Y]es/[N]o/[C]ancel: \"; " ) ;
4974  strcat( lDialogString , "stty sane -echo;" ) ;
4975  strcat( lDialogString ,
4976  "answer=$( while ! head -c 1 | grep -i [nyc];do true ;done);");
4977  strcat( lDialogString ,
4978  "if echo \"$answer\" | grep -iq \"^y\";then\n\techo 1\n");
4979  strcat( lDialogString , "elif echo \"$answer\" | grep -iq \"^n\";then\n\techo 2\n" ) ;
4980  strcat( lDialogString , "else\n\techo 0\nfi" ) ;
4981  }
4982  else
4983  {
4984  strcat(lDialogString , "echo -n \"press enter to continue \"; ");
4985  strcat( lDialogString , "stty sane -echo;" ) ;
4986  strcat( lDialogString ,
4987  "answer=$( while ! head -c 1;do true ;done);echo 1");
4988  }
4989  strcat( lDialogString ,
4990  " >/tmp/tinyfd.txt';cat /tmp/tinyfd.txt;rm /tmp/tinyfd.txt");
4991  }
4992  else if ( !isTerminalRunning() && pythonDbusPresent() && !strcmp("ok" , aDialogType) )
4993  {
4994  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python-dbus");return 1;}
4995  strcpy( lDialogString , gPythonName ) ;
4996  strcat( lDialogString ," -c \"import dbus;bus=dbus.SessionBus();");
4997  strcat( lDialogString ,"notif=bus.get_object('org.freedesktop.Notifications','/org/freedesktop/Notifications');" ) ;
4998  strcat( lDialogString ,"notify=dbus.Interface(notif,'org.freedesktop.Notifications');" ) ;
4999  strcat( lDialogString ,"notify.Notify('',0,'" ) ;
5000  if ( aIconType && strlen(aIconType) )
5001  {
5002  strcat( lDialogString , aIconType ) ;
5003  }
5004  strcat(lDialogString, "','") ;
5005  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5006  {
5007  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5008  }
5009  strcat(lDialogString, "','") ;
5010  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5011  {
5012  lpDialogString = lDialogString + strlen(lDialogString);
5013  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\n" , "\\n" , lpDialogString ) ;
5014  }
5015  strcat(lDialogString, "','','',5000)\"") ;
5016  }
5017  else if ( !isTerminalRunning() && (perlPresent() >= 2) && !strcmp("ok" , aDialogType) )
5018  {
5019  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"perl-dbus");return 1;}
5020 
5021  strcpy( lDialogString , "perl -e \"use Net::DBus;\
5022 my \\$sessionBus = Net::DBus->session;\
5023 my \\$notificationsService = \\$sessionBus->get_service('org.freedesktop.Notifications');\
5024 my \\$notificationsObject = \\$notificationsService->get_object('/org/freedesktop/Notifications',\
5025 'org.freedesktop.Notifications');");
5026 
5027  sprintf( lDialogString + strlen(lDialogString),
5028 "my \\$notificationId;\\$notificationId = \\$notificationsObject->Notify(shift, 0, '%s', '%s', '%s', [], {}, -1);\" ",
5029  aIconType?aIconType:"", aTitle?aTitle:"", aMessage?aMessage:"" ) ;
5030  }
5031  else if ( !isTerminalRunning() && notifysendPresent() && !strcmp("ok" , aDialogType) )
5032  {
5033 
5034  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"notifysend");return 1;}
5035  strcpy( lDialogString , "notify-send" ) ;
5036  if ( aIconType && strlen(aIconType) )
5037  {
5038  strcat( lDialogString , " -i '" ) ;
5039  strcat( lDialogString , aIconType ) ;
5040  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
5041  }
5042  strcat( lDialogString , " \"" ) ;
5043  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5044  {
5045  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5046  strcat( lDialogString , " | " ) ;
5047  }
5048  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5049  {
5050  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\n\t" , " | " , lBuff ) ;
5051  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\n" , " | " , lBuff ) ;
5052  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\t" , " " , lBuff ) ;
5053  strcat(lDialogString, lBuff) ;
5054  }
5055  strcat( lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
5056  }
5057  else
5058  {
5059  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"basicinput");return 0;}
5060  if ( !gWarningDisplayed && !tinyfd_forceConsole)
5061  {
5062  gWarningDisplayed = 1 ;
5063  printf("\n\n%s\n", gTitle);
5064  printf("%s\n\n", tinyfd_needs);
5065  }
5066  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5067  {
5068  printf("\n%s\n", aTitle);
5069  }
5070 
5071  tcgetattr(0, &infoOri);
5072  tcgetattr(0, &info);
5073  info.c_lflag &= ~ICANON;
5074  info.c_cc[VMIN] = 1;
5075  info.c_cc[VTIME] = 0;
5076  tcsetattr(0, TCSANOW, &info);
5077  if ( aDialogType && !strcmp("yesno",aDialogType) )
5078  {
5079  do
5080  {
5081  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5082  {
5083  printf("\n%s\n",aMessage);
5084  }
5085  printf("y/n: "); fflush(stdout);
5086  lChar = tolower( getchar() ) ;
5087  printf("\n\n");
5088  }
5089  while ( lChar != 'y' && lChar != 'n' );
5090  lResult = lChar == 'y' ? 1 : 0 ;
5091  }
5092  else if ( aDialogType && !strcmp("okcancel",aDialogType) )
5093  {
5094  do
5095  {
5096  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5097  {
5098  printf("\n%s\n",aMessage);
5099  }
5100  printf("[O]kay/[C]ancel: "); fflush(stdout);
5101  lChar = tolower( getchar() ) ;
5102  printf("\n\n");
5103  }
5104  while ( lChar != 'o' && lChar != 'c' );
5105  lResult = lChar == 'o' ? 1 : 0 ;
5106  }
5107  else if ( aDialogType && !strcmp("yesnocancel",aDialogType) )
5108  {
5109  do
5110  {
5111  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5112  {
5113  printf("\n%s\n",aMessage);
5114  }
5115  printf("[Y]es/[N]o/[C]ancel: "); fflush(stdout);
5116  lChar = tolower( getchar() ) ;
5117  printf("\n\n");
5118  }
5119  while ( lChar != 'y' && lChar != 'n' && lChar != 'c' );
5120  lResult = (lChar == 'y') ? 1 : (lChar == 'n') ? 2 : 0 ;
5121  }
5122  else
5123  {
5124  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5125  {
5126  printf("\n%s\n\n",aMessage);
5127  }
5128  printf("press enter to continue "); fflush(stdout);
5129  getchar() ;
5130  printf("\n\n");
5131  lResult = 1 ;
5132  }
5133  tcsetattr(0, TCSANOW, &infoOri);
5134  free(lDialogString);
5135  return lResult ;
5136  }
5137 
5138  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ;
5139 
5140  if ( ! ( lIn = popen( lDialogString , "r" ) ) )
5141  {
5142  free(lDialogString);
5143  return 0 ;
5144  }
5145  while ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
5146  {}
5147 
5148  pclose( lIn ) ;
5149 
5150  /* printf( "lBuff: %s len: %lu \n" , lBuff , strlen(lBuff) ) ; */
5151  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
5152  {
5153  lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
5154  }
5155  /* printf( "lBuff1: %s len: %lu \n" , lBuff , strlen(lBuff) ) ; */
5156 
5157  if (aDialogType && !strcmp("yesnocancel", aDialogType))
5158  {
5159  if ( lBuff[0]=='1' )
5160  {
5161  if ( !strcmp( lBuff+1 , "Yes" )) strcpy(lBuff,"1");
5162  else if ( !strcmp( lBuff+1 , "No" )) strcpy(lBuff,"2");
5163  }
5164  }
5165  /* printf( "lBuff2: %s len: %lu \n" , lBuff , strlen(lBuff) ) ; */
5166 
5167  lResult = !strcmp( lBuff , "2" ) ? 2 : !strcmp( lBuff , "1" ) ? 1 : 0;
5168 
5169  /* printf( "lResult: %d\n" , lResult ) ; */
5170  free(lDialogString);
5171  return lResult ;
5172 }
5173 
5174 
5175 /* return has only meaning for tinyfd_query */
5176 int tinyfd_notifyPopup(
5177  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
5178  char const * aMessage , /* NULL or "" may contain \n and \t */
5179  char const * aIconType ) /* "info" "warning" "error" */
5180 {
5181  char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
5182  char * lDialogString = NULL ;
5183  char * lpDialogString ;
5184  FILE * lIn ;
5185  size_t lTitleLen ;
5186  size_t lMessageLen ;
5187 
5188  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_notifyPopup("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aMessage, aIconType);
5189  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aMessage)) return tinyfd_notifyPopup(aTitle, "INVALID MESSAGE WITH QUOTES", aIconType);
5190 
5191  if ( getenv("SSH_TTY") )
5192  {
5193  return tinyfd_messageBox(aTitle, aMessage, "ok", aIconType, 0);
5194  }
5195 
5196  lTitleLen = aTitle ? strlen(aTitle) : 0 ;
5197  lMessageLen = aMessage ? strlen(aMessage) : 0 ;
5198  if ( !aTitle || strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query") )
5199  {
5200  lDialogString = (char *) malloc( MAX_PATH_OR_CMD + lTitleLen + lMessageLen );
5201  }
5202 
5203  if ( osascriptPresent( ) )
5204  {
5205  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"applescript");return 1;}
5206 
5207  strcpy( lDialogString , "osascript ");
5208  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'tell application \"System Events\"' -e 'Activate'");
5209  strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'try' -e 'display notification \"") ;
5210  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5211  {
5212  strcat(lDialogString, aMessage) ;
5213  }
5214  strcat(lDialogString, " \" ") ;
5215  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5216  {
5217  strcat(lDialogString, "with title \"") ;
5218  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5219  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
5220  }
5221 
5222  strcat( lDialogString, "' -e 'end try'") ;
5223  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString, " -e 'end tell'") ;
5224  }
5225  else if ( tfd_kdialogPresent() )
5226  {
5227  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"kdialog");return 1;}
5228  strcpy( lDialogString , "kdialog" ) ;
5229 
5230  if ( aIconType && strlen(aIconType) )
5231  {
5232  strcat( lDialogString , " --icon '" ) ;
5233  strcat( lDialogString , aIconType ) ;
5234  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
5235  }
5236  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5237  {
5238  strcat( lDialogString , " --title \"" ) ;
5239  strcat( lDialogString , aTitle ) ;
5240  strcat( lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
5241  }
5242 
5243  strcat( lDialogString , " --passivepopup" ) ;
5244  strcat( lDialogString , " \"" ) ;
5245  if ( aMessage )
5246  {
5247  strcat( lDialogString , aMessage ) ;
5248  }
5249  strcat( lDialogString , " \" 5" ) ;
5250  }
5251  else if ( (tfd_zenity3Present()>=5) )
5252  {
5253  /* zenity 2.32 & 3.14 has the notification but with a bug: it doesnt return from it */
5254  /* zenity 3.8 show the notification as an alert ok cancel box */
5255  if ( tfd_zenity3Present()>=5 )
5256  {
5257  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"zenity");return 1;}
5258  strcpy( lDialogString , "zenity" ) ;
5259  }
5260 
5261  strcat( lDialogString , " --notification");
5262 
5263  if ( aIconType && strlen( aIconType ) )
5264  {
5265  strcat( lDialogString , " --window-icon '");
5266  strcat( lDialogString , aIconType ) ;
5267  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
5268  }
5269 
5270  strcat( lDialogString , " --text \"" ) ;
5271  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5272  {
5273  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5274  strcat(lDialogString, "\n") ;
5275  }
5276  if ( aMessage && strlen( aMessage ) )
5277  {
5278  strcat( lDialogString , aMessage ) ;
5279  }
5280  strcat( lDialogString , " \"" ) ;
5281  }
5282  else if ( perlPresent() >= 2 )
5283  {
5284  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"perl-dbus");return 1;}
5285 
5286  strcpy( lDialogString , "perl -e \"use Net::DBus;\
5287 my \\$sessionBus = Net::DBus->session;\
5288 my \\$notificationsService = \\$sessionBus->get_service('org.freedesktop.Notifications');\
5289 my \\$notificationsObject = \\$notificationsService->get_object('/org/freedesktop/Notifications',\
5290 'org.freedesktop.Notifications');");
5291 
5292  sprintf( lDialogString + strlen(lDialogString) ,
5293 "my \\$notificationId;\\$notificationId = \\$notificationsObject->Notify(shift, 0, '%s', '%s', '%s', [], {}, -1);\" ",
5294 aIconType?aIconType:"", aTitle?aTitle:"", aMessage?aMessage:"" ) ;
5295  }
5296  else if ( pythonDbusPresent( ) )
5297  {
5298  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python-dbus");return 1;}
5299  strcpy( lDialogString , gPythonName ) ;
5300  strcat( lDialogString ," -c \"import dbus;bus=dbus.SessionBus();");
5301  strcat( lDialogString ,"notif=bus.get_object('org.freedesktop.Notifications','/org/freedesktop/Notifications');" ) ;
5302  strcat( lDialogString ,"notify=dbus.Interface(notif,'org.freedesktop.Notifications');" ) ;
5303  strcat( lDialogString ,"notify.Notify('',0,'" ) ;
5304  if ( aIconType && strlen(aIconType) )
5305  {
5306  strcat( lDialogString , aIconType ) ;
5307  }
5308  strcat(lDialogString, "','") ;
5309  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5310  {
5311  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5312  }
5313  strcat(lDialogString, "','") ;
5314  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5315  {
5316  lpDialogString = lDialogString + strlen(lDialogString);
5317  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\n" , "\\n" , lpDialogString ) ;
5318  }
5319  strcat(lDialogString, "','','',5000)\"") ;
5320  }
5321  else if ( notifysendPresent() )
5322  {
5323  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"notifysend");return 1;}
5324  strcpy( lDialogString , "notify-send" ) ;
5325  if ( aIconType && strlen(aIconType) )
5326  {
5327  strcat( lDialogString , " -i '" ) ;
5328  strcat( lDialogString , aIconType ) ;
5329  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
5330  }
5331  strcat( lDialogString , " \"" ) ;
5332  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5333  {
5334  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5335  strcat( lDialogString , " | " ) ;
5336  }
5337  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5338  {
5339  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\n\t" , " | " , lBuff ) ;
5340  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\n" , " | " , lBuff ) ;
5341  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\t" , " " , lBuff ) ;
5342  strcat(lDialogString, lBuff) ;
5343  }
5344  strcat( lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
5345  }
5346  else
5347  {
5348  return tinyfd_messageBox(aTitle, aMessage, "ok", aIconType, 0);
5349  }
5350 
5351  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ;
5352 
5353  if ( ! ( lIn = popen( lDialogString , "r" ) ) )
5354  {
5355  free(lDialogString);
5356  return 0 ;
5357  }
5358 
5359  pclose( lIn ) ;
5360  free(lDialogString);
5361  return 1;
5362 }
5363 
5364 
5365 /* returns NULL on cancel */
5366 char * tinyfd_inputBox(
5367  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
5368  char const * aMessage , /* NULL or "" (\n and \t have no effect) */
5369  char const * aDefaultInput ) /* "" , if NULL it's a passwordBox */
5370 {
5371  static char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD];
5372  char * lDialogString = NULL;
5373  char * lpDialogString;
5374  FILE * lIn ;
5375  int lResult ;
5376  int lWasGdialog = 0 ;
5377  int lWasGraphicDialog = 0 ;
5378  int lWasXterm = 0 ;
5379  int lWasBasicXterm = 0 ;
5380  struct termios oldt ;
5381  struct termios newt ;
5382  char * lEOF;
5383  size_t lTitleLen ;
5384  size_t lMessageLen ;
5385 
5386  if (!aTitle && !aMessage && !aDefaultInput) return lBuff; /* now I can fill lBuff from outside */
5387 
5388  lBuff[0]='\0';
5389 
5390  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_inputBox("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aMessage, aDefaultInput);
5391  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aMessage)) return tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, "INVALID MESSAGE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultInput);
5392  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultInput)) return tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, aMessage, "INVALID DEFAULT_INPUT WITH QUOTES");
5393 
5394  lTitleLen = aTitle ? strlen(aTitle) : 0 ;
5395  lMessageLen = aMessage ? strlen(aMessage) : 0 ;
5396  if ( !aTitle || strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query") )
5397  {
5398  lDialogString = (char *) malloc( MAX_PATH_OR_CMD + lTitleLen + lMessageLen );
5399  }
5400 
5401  if ( osascriptPresent( ) )
5402  {
5403  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"applescript");return (char *)1;}
5404  strcpy( lDialogString , "osascript ");
5405  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'tell application \"System Events\"' -e 'Activate'");
5406  strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'try' -e 'display dialog \"") ;
5407  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5408  {
5409  strcat(lDialogString, aMessage) ;
5410  }
5411  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
5412  strcat(lDialogString, "default answer \"") ;
5413  if ( aDefaultInput && strlen(aDefaultInput) )
5414  {
5415  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultInput) ;
5416  }
5417  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
5418  if ( ! aDefaultInput )
5419  {
5420  strcat(lDialogString, "hidden answer true ") ;
5421  }
5422  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5423  {
5424  strcat(lDialogString, "with title \"") ;
5425  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5426  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
5427  }
5428  strcat(lDialogString, "with icon note' ") ;
5429  strcat(lDialogString, "-e '\"1\" & text returned of result' " );
5430  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'on error number -128' " ) ;
5431  strcat(lDialogString, "-e '0' " );
