5432  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'end try'") ;
5433  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat(lDialogString, " -e 'end tell'") ;
5434  }
5435  else if ( tfd_kdialogPresent() )
5436  {
5437  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"kdialog");return (char *)1;}
5438  strcpy( lDialogString , "szAnswer=$(kdialog" ) ;
5439 
5440  if ( (tfd_kdialogPresent() == 2) && tfd_xpropPresent() )
5441  {
5442  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
5443  }
5444 
5445  if ( ! aDefaultInput )
5446  {
5447  strcat(lDialogString, " --password ") ;
5448  }
5449  else
5450  {
5451  strcat(lDialogString, " --inputbox ") ;
5452 
5453  }
5454  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
5455  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5456  {
5457  strcat(lDialogString, aMessage ) ;
5458  }
5459  strcat(lDialogString , "\" \"" ) ;
5460  if ( aDefaultInput && strlen(aDefaultInput) )
5461  {
5462  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultInput ) ;
5463  }
5464  strcat(lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
5465  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5466  {
5467  strcat(lDialogString, " --title \"") ;
5468  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5469  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
5470  }
5471  strcat( lDialogString ,
5472  ");if [ $? = 0 ];then echo 1$szAnswer;else echo 0$szAnswer;fi");
5473  }
5474  else if ( tfd_zenityPresent() || tfd_matedialogPresent() || tfd_shellementaryPresent() || tfd_qarmaPresent() )
5475  {
5476  if ( tfd_zenityPresent() )
5477  {
5478  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"zenity");return (char *)1;}
5479  strcpy( lDialogString , "szAnswer=$(zenity" ) ;
5480  if ( (tfd_zenity3Present() >= 4) && !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
5481  {
5482  strcat( lDialogString, " --attach=$(sleep .01;xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
5483  }
5484  }
5485  else if ( tfd_matedialogPresent() )
5486  {
5487  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"matedialog");return (char *)1;}
5488  strcpy( lDialogString , "szAnswer=$(matedialog" ) ;
5489  }
5490  else if ( tfd_shellementaryPresent() )
5491  {
5492  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"shellementary");return (char *)1;}
5493  strcpy( lDialogString , "szAnswer=$(shellementary" ) ;
5494  }
5495  else
5496  {
5497  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"qarma");return (char *)1;}
5498  strcpy( lDialogString , "szAnswer=$(qarma" ) ;
5499  if ( !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
5500  {
5501  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
5502  }
5503  }
5504  strcat( lDialogString ," --entry" ) ;
5505 
5506  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5507  {
5508  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"") ;
5509  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5510  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
5511  }
5512  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5513  {
5514  strcat(lDialogString, " --text=\"") ;
5515  strcat(lDialogString, aMessage) ;
5516  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
5517  }
5518  if ( aDefaultInput && strlen(aDefaultInput) )
5519  {
5520  strcat(lDialogString, " --entry-text=\"") ;
5521  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultInput) ;
5522  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
5523  }
5524  else
5525  {
5526  strcat(lDialogString, " --hide-text") ;
5527  }
5528  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat( lDialogString , " 2>/dev/null ");
5529  strcat( lDialogString ,
5530  ");if [ $? = 0 ];then echo 1$szAnswer;else echo 0$szAnswer;fi");
5531  }
5532  else if (tfd_yadPresent())
5533  {
5534  if (aTitle && !strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")) { strcpy(tinyfd_response, "yad"); return (char*)1; }
5535  strcpy(lDialogString, "szAnswer=$(yad --entry");
5536  if (aTitle && strlen(aTitle))
5537  {
5538  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"");
5539  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle);
5540  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
5541  }
5542  if (aMessage && strlen(aMessage))
5543  {
5544  strcat(lDialogString, " --text=\"");
5545  strcat(lDialogString, aMessage);
5546  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
5547  }
5548  if (aDefaultInput && strlen(aDefaultInput))
5549  {
5550  strcat(lDialogString, " --entry-text=\"");
5551  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultInput);
5552  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
5553  }
5554  else
5555  {
5556  strcat(lDialogString, " --hide-text");
5557  }
5558  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat(lDialogString, " 2>/dev/null ");
5559  strcat(lDialogString,
5560  ");if [ $? = 0 ];then echo 1$szAnswer;else echo 0$szAnswer;fi");
5561  }
5562  else if ( gxmessagePresent() || gmessagePresent() )
5563  {
5564  if ( gxmessagePresent() ) {
5565  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"gxmessage");return (char *)1;}
5566  strcpy( lDialogString , "szAnswer=$(gxmessage -buttons Ok:1,Cancel:0 -center \"");
5567  }
5568  else
5569  {
5570  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"gmessage");return (char *)1;}
5571  strcpy( lDialogString , "szAnswer=$(gmessage -buttons Ok:1,Cancel:0 -center \"");
5572  }
5573 
5574  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5575  {
5576  strcat( lDialogString , aMessage ) ;
5577  }
5578  strcat(lDialogString, "\"" ) ;
5579  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5580  {
5581  strcat( lDialogString , " -title \"");
5582  strcat( lDialogString , aTitle ) ;
5583  strcat(lDialogString, "\" " ) ;
5584  }
5585  strcat(lDialogString, " -entrytext \"" ) ;
5586  if ( aDefaultInput && strlen(aDefaultInput) )
5587  {
5588  strcat( lDialogString , aDefaultInput ) ;
5589  }
5590  strcat(lDialogString, "\"" ) ;
5591  strcat( lDialogString , ");echo $?$szAnswer");
5592  }
5593  else if ( !gdialogPresent() && !xdialogPresent() && tkinter3Present( ) )
5594  {
5595  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python3-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
5596  strcpy( lDialogString , gPython3Name ) ;
5597  strcat( lDialogString ,
5598  " -S -c \"import tkinter; from tkinter import simpledialog;root=tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
5599  strcat( lDialogString ,"res=simpledialog.askstring(" ) ;
5600  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5601  {
5602  strcat(lDialogString, "title='") ;
5603  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5604  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
5605  }
5606  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5607  {
5608 
5609  strcat(lDialogString, "prompt='") ;
5610  lpDialogString = lDialogString + strlen(lDialogString);
5611  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\n" , "\\n" , lpDialogString ) ;
5612  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
5613  }
5614  if ( aDefaultInput )
5615  {
5616  if ( strlen(aDefaultInput) )
5617  {
5618  strcat(lDialogString, "initialvalue='") ;
5619  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultInput) ;
5620  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
5621  }
5622  }
5623  else
5624  {
5625  strcat(lDialogString, "show='*'") ;
5626  }
5627  strcat(lDialogString, ");\nif res is None :\n\tprint(0)");
5628  strcat(lDialogString, "\nelse :\n\tprint('1'+res)\n\"" ) ;
5629  }
5630  else if ( !gdialogPresent() && !xdialogPresent() && tkinter2Present( ) )
5631  {
5632  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python2-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
5633  strcpy( lDialogString , "export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8;" ) ;
5634  strcat( lDialogString , gPython2Name ) ;
5635  if ( ! isTerminalRunning( ) && tfd_isDarwin( ) )
5636  {
5637  strcat( lDialogString , " -i" ) ; /* for osx without console */
5638  }
5639 
5640  strcat( lDialogString ,
5641  " -S -c \"import Tkinter,tkSimpleDialog;root=Tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
5642 
5643  if ( tfd_isDarwin( ) )
5644  {
5645  strcat( lDialogString ,
5646 "import os;os.system('''/usr/bin/osascript -e 'tell app \\\"Finder\\\" to set \
5647 frontmost of process \\\"Python\\\" to true' ''');");
5648  }
5649 
5650  strcat( lDialogString ,"res=tkSimpleDialog.askstring(" ) ;
5651  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5652  {
5653  strcat(lDialogString, "title='") ;
5654  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5655  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
5656  }
5657  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5658  {
5659 
5660  strcat(lDialogString, "prompt='") ;
5661  lpDialogString = lDialogString + strlen(lDialogString);
5662  tfd_replaceSubStr( aMessage , "\n" , "\\n" , lpDialogString ) ;
5663  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
5664  }
5665  if ( aDefaultInput )
5666  {
5667  if ( strlen(aDefaultInput) )
5668  {
5669  strcat(lDialogString, "initialvalue='") ;
5670  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultInput) ;
5671  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
5672  }
5673  }
5674  else
5675  {
5676  strcat(lDialogString, "show='*'") ;
5677  }
5678  strcat(lDialogString, ");\nif res is None :\n\tprint 0");
5679  strcat(lDialogString, "\nelse :\n\tprint '1'+res\n\"" ) ;
5680  }
5681  else if ( gdialogPresent() || xdialogPresent() || dialogName() || whiptailPresent() )
5682  {
5683  if ( gdialogPresent( ) )
5684  {
5685  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"gdialog");return (char *)1;}
5686  lWasGraphicDialog = 1 ;
5687  lWasGdialog = 1 ;
5688  strcpy( lDialogString , "(gdialog " ) ;
5689  }
5690  else if ( xdialogPresent( ) )
5691  {
5692  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"xdialog");return (char *)1;}
5693  lWasGraphicDialog = 1 ;
5694  strcpy( lDialogString , "(Xdialog " ) ;
5695  }
5696  else if ( dialogName( ) )
5697  {
5698  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"dialog");return (char *)0;}
5699  if ( isTerminalRunning( ) )
5700  {
5701  strcpy( lDialogString , "(dialog " ) ;
5702  }
5703  else
5704  {
5705  lWasXterm = 1 ;
5706  strcpy( lDialogString , terminalName() ) ;
5707  strcat( lDialogString , "'(" ) ;
5708  strcat( lDialogString , dialogName() ) ;
5709  strcat( lDialogString , " " ) ;
5710  }
5711  }
5712  else if ( isTerminalRunning( ) )
5713  {
5714  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"whiptail");return (char *)0;}
5715  strcpy( lDialogString , "(whiptail " ) ;
5716  }
5717  else
5718  {
5719  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"whiptail");return (char *)0;}
5720  lWasXterm = 1 ;
5721  strcpy( lDialogString , terminalName() ) ;
5722  strcat( lDialogString , "'(whiptail " ) ;
5723  }
5724 
5725  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5726  {
5727  strcat(lDialogString, "--title \"") ;
5728  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5729  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
5730  }
5731 
5732  if ( !xdialogPresent() && !gdialogPresent() )
5733  {
5734  strcat(lDialogString, "--backtitle \"") ;
5735  strcat(lDialogString, "tab: move focus") ;
5736  if ( ! aDefaultInput && !lWasGdialog )
5737  {
5738  strcat(lDialogString, " (sometimes nothing, no blink nor star, is shown in text field)") ;
5739  }
5740  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
5741  }
5742 
5743  if ( aDefaultInput || lWasGdialog )
5744  {
5745  strcat( lDialogString , "--inputbox" ) ;
5746  }
5747  else
5748  {
5749  if ( !lWasGraphicDialog && dialogName() && isDialogVersionBetter09b() )
5750  {
5751  strcat( lDialogString , "--insecure " ) ;
5752  }
5753  strcat( lDialogString , "--passwordbox" ) ;
5754  }
5755  strcat( lDialogString , " \"" ) ;
5756  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5757  {
5758  strcat(lDialogString, aMessage) ;
5759  }
5760  strcat(lDialogString,"\" 10 60 ") ;
5761  if ( aDefaultInput && strlen(aDefaultInput) )
5762  {
5763  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
5764  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultInput) ;
5765  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
5766  }
5767  if ( lWasGraphicDialog )
5768  {
5769  strcat(lDialogString,") 2>/tmp/tinyfd.txt;\
5770  if [ $? = 0 ];then tinyfdBool=1;else tinyfdBool=0;fi;\
5771  tinyfdRes=$(cat /tmp/tinyfd.txt);echo $tinyfdBool$tinyfdRes") ;
5772  }
5773  else
5774  {
5775  strcat(lDialogString,">/dev/tty ) 2>/tmp/tinyfd.txt;\
5776  if [ $? = 0 ];then tinyfdBool=1;else tinyfdBool=0;fi;\
5777  tinyfdRes=$(cat /tmp/tinyfd.txt);echo $tinyfdBool$tinyfdRes") ;
5778 
5779  if ( lWasXterm )
5780  {
5781  strcat(lDialogString," >/tmp/tinyfd0.txt';cat /tmp/tinyfd0.txt");
5782  }
5783  else
5784  {
5785  strcat(lDialogString, "; clear >/dev/tty") ;
5786  }
5787  }
5788  }
5789  else if ( ! isTerminalRunning( ) && terminalName() )
5790  {
5791  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"basicinput");return (char *)0;}
5792  lWasBasicXterm = 1 ;
5793  strcpy( lDialogString , terminalName() ) ;
5794  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
5795  if ( !gWarningDisplayed && !tinyfd_forceConsole)
5796  {
5797  gWarningDisplayed = 1 ;
5798  tinyfd_messageBox(gTitle,tinyfd_needs,"ok","warning",0);
5799  }
5800  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) && !tinyfd_forceConsole)
5801  {
5802  strcat( lDialogString , "echo \"" ) ;
5803  strcat( lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5804  strcat( lDialogString , "\";echo;" ) ;
5805  }
5806 
5807  strcat( lDialogString , "echo \"" ) ;
5808  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5809  {
5810  strcat( lDialogString, aMessage) ;
5811  }
5812  strcat( lDialogString , "\";read " ) ;
5813  if ( ! aDefaultInput )
5814  {
5815  strcat( lDialogString , "-s " ) ;
5816  }
5817  strcat( lDialogString , "-p \"" ) ;
5818  strcat( lDialogString , "(esc+enter to cancel): \" ANSWER " ) ;
5819  strcat( lDialogString , ";echo 1$ANSWER >/tmp/tinyfd.txt';" ) ;
5820  strcat( lDialogString , "cat -v /tmp/tinyfd.txt");
5821  }
5822  else if ( !gWarningDisplayed && ! isTerminalRunning( ) && ! terminalName() ) {
5823  gWarningDisplayed = 1 ;
5824  tinyfd_messageBox(gTitle,tinyfd_needs,"ok","warning",0);
5825  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"no_solution");return (char *)0;}
5826  free(lDialogString);
5827  return NULL;
5828  }
5829  else
5830  {
5831  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"basicinput");return (char *)0;}
5832  if ( !gWarningDisplayed && !tinyfd_forceConsole)
5833  {
5834  gWarningDisplayed = 1 ;
5835  tinyfd_messageBox(gTitle,tinyfd_needs,"ok","warning",0);
5836  }
5837  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5838  {
5839  printf("\n%s\n", aTitle);
5840  }
5841  if ( aMessage && strlen(aMessage) )
5842  {
5843  printf("\n%s\n",aMessage);
5844  }
5845  printf("(esc+enter to cancel): "); fflush(stdout);
5846  if ( ! aDefaultInput )
5847  {
5848  tcgetattr(STDIN_FILENO, & oldt) ;
5849  newt = oldt ;
5850  newt.c_lflag &= ~ECHO ;
5851  tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, & newt);
5852  }
5853 
5854  lEOF = fgets(lBuff, MAX_PATH_OR_CMD, stdin);
5855  /* printf("lbuff<%c><%d>\n",lBuff[0],lBuff[0]); */
5856  if ( ! lEOF || (lBuff[0] == '\0') )
5857  {
5858  free(lDialogString);
5859  return NULL;
5860  }
5861 
5862  if ( lBuff[0] == '\n' )
5863  {
5864  lEOF = fgets(lBuff, MAX_PATH_OR_CMD, stdin);
5865  /* printf("lbuff<%c><%d>\n",lBuff[0],lBuff[0]); */
5866  if ( ! lEOF || (lBuff[0] == '\0') )
5867  {
5868  free(lDialogString);
5869  return NULL;
5870  }
5871  }
5872 
5873  if ( ! aDefaultInput )
5874  {
5875  tcsetattr(STDIN_FILENO, TCSANOW, & oldt);
5876  printf("\n");
5877  }
5878  printf("\n");
5879  if ( strchr(lBuff,27) )
5880  {
5881  free(lDialogString);
5882  return NULL ;
5883  }
5884  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
5885  {
5886  lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
5887  }
5888  free(lDialogString);
5889  return lBuff ;
5890  }
5891 
5892  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ;
5893  lIn = popen( lDialogString , "r" );
5894  if ( ! lIn )
5895  {
5896  if ( fileExists("/tmp/tinyfd.txt") )
5897  {
5898  wipefile("/tmp/tinyfd.txt");
5899  remove("/tmp/tinyfd.txt");
5900  }
5901  if ( fileExists("/tmp/tinyfd0.txt") )
5902  {
5903  wipefile("/tmp/tinyfd0.txt");
5904  remove("/tmp/tinyfd0.txt");
5905  }
5906  free(lDialogString);
5907  return NULL ;
5908  }
5909  while ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
5910  {}
5911 
5912  pclose( lIn ) ;
5913 
5914  if ( fileExists("/tmp/tinyfd.txt") )
5915  {
5916  wipefile("/tmp/tinyfd.txt");
5917  remove("/tmp/tinyfd.txt");
5918  }
5919  if ( fileExists("/tmp/tinyfd0.txt") )
5920  {
5921  wipefile("/tmp/tinyfd0.txt");
5922  remove("/tmp/tinyfd0.txt");
5923  }
5924 
5925  /* printf( "len Buff: %lu\n" , strlen(lBuff) ) ; */
5926  /* printf( "lBuff0: %s\n" , lBuff ) ; */
5927  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
5928  {
5929  lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
5930  }
5931  /* printf( "lBuff1: %s len: %lu \n" , lBuff , strlen(lBuff) ) ; */
5932  if ( lWasBasicXterm )
5933  {
5934  if ( strstr(lBuff,"^[") ) /* esc was pressed */
5935  {
5936  free(lDialogString);
5937  return NULL ;
5938  }
5939  }
5940 
5941  lResult = strncmp( lBuff , "1" , 1) ? 0 : 1 ;
5942  /* printf( "lResult: %d \n" , lResult ) ; */
5943  if ( ! lResult )
5944  {
5945  free(lDialogString);
5946  return NULL ;
5947  }
5948 
5949  /* printf( "lBuff+1: %s\n" , lBuff+1 ) ; */
5950  free(lDialogString);
5951  return lBuff+1 ;
5952 }
5953 
5954 
5955 char * tinyfd_saveFileDialog(
5956  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
5957  char const * aDefaultPathAndFile , /* NULL or "" */
5958  int aNumOfFilterPatterns , /* 0 */
5959  char const * const * aFilterPatterns , /* NULL or {"*.jpg","*.png"} */
5960  char const * aSingleFilterDescription ) /* NULL or "image files" */
5961 {
5962  static char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
5963  char lDialogString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
5964  char lString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
5965  int i ;
5966  int lWasGraphicDialog = 0 ;
5967  int lWasXterm = 0 ;
5968  char * p ;
5969  char * lPointerInputBox ;
5970  FILE * lIn ;
5971  lBuff[0]='\0';
5972 
5973  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_saveFileDialog("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription);
5974  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultPathAndFile)) return tinyfd_saveFileDialog(aTitle, "INVALID DEFAULT_PATH WITH QUOTES", aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription);
5975  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aSingleFilterDescription)) return tinyfd_saveFileDialog(aTitle, aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, "INVALID FILTER_DESCRIPTION WITH QUOTES");
5976  for (i = 0; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns; i++)
5977  {
5978  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aFilterPatterns[i])) return tinyfd_saveFileDialog("INVALID FILTER_PATTERN WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPathAndFile, 0, NULL, NULL);
5979  }
5980 
5981  if ( osascriptPresent( ) )
5982  {
5983  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"applescript");return (char *)1;}
5984  strcpy( lDialogString , "osascript ");
5985  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'tell application \"Finder\"' -e 'Activate'");
5986  strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'try' -e 'POSIX path of ( choose file name " );
5987  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
5988  {
5989  strcat(lDialogString, "with prompt \"") ;
5990  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
5991  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
5992  }
5993  getPathWithoutFinalSlash( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
5994  if ( strlen(lString) )
5995  {
5996  strcat(lDialogString, "default location \"") ;
5997  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
5998  strcat(lDialogString , "\" " ) ;
5999  }
6000  getLastName( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6001  if ( strlen(lString) )
6002  {
6003  strcat(lDialogString, "default name \"") ;
6004  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6005  strcat(lDialogString , "\" " ) ;
6006  }
6007  strcat( lDialogString , ")' " ) ;
6008  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'on error number -128' " ) ;
6009  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'end try'") ;
6010  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString, " -e 'end tell'") ;
6011  }
6012  else if ( tfd_kdialogPresent() )
6013  {
6014  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"kdialog");return (char *)1;}
6015 
6016  strcpy( lDialogString , "kdialog" ) ;
6017  if ( (tfd_kdialogPresent() == 2) && tfd_xpropPresent() )
6018  {
6019  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
6020  }
6021  strcat( lDialogString , " --getsavefilename " ) ;
6022 
6023  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6024  {
6025  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile[0] != '/' )
6026  {
6027  strcat(lDialogString, "$PWD/") ;
6028  }
6029  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
6030  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6031  strcat(lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
6032  }
6033  else
6034  {
6035  strcat(lDialogString, "$PWD/") ;
6036  }
6037 
6038  if ( aNumOfFilterPatterns > 0 )
6039  {
6040  strcat(lDialogString , " \"" ) ;
6041  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[0] ) ;
6042  for ( i = 1 ; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns ; i ++ )
6043  {
6044  strcat( lDialogString , " " ) ;
6045  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[i] ) ;
6046  }
6047  if ( aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription) )
6048  {
6049  strcat( lDialogString , " | " ) ;
6050  strcat( lDialogString , aSingleFilterDescription ) ;
6051  }
6052  strcat( lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
6053  }
6054  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6055  {
6056  strcat(lDialogString, " --title \"") ;
6057  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6058  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
6059  }
6060  }
6061  else if ( tfd_zenityPresent() || tfd_matedialogPresent() || tfd_shellementaryPresent() || tfd_qarmaPresent() )
6062  {
6063  if ( tfd_zenityPresent() )
6064  {
6065  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"zenity");return (char *)1;}
6066  strcpy( lDialogString , "zenity" ) ;
6067  if ( (tfd_zenity3Present() >= 4) && !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
6068  {
6069  strcat( lDialogString, " --attach=$(sleep .01;xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
6070  }
6071  }
6072  else if ( tfd_matedialogPresent() )
6073  {
6074  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"matedialog");return (char *)1;}
6075  strcpy( lDialogString , "matedialog" ) ;
6076  }
6077  else if ( tfd_shellementaryPresent() )
6078  {
6079  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"shellementary");return (char *)1;}
6080  strcpy( lDialogString , "shellementary" ) ;
6081  }
6082  else
6083  {
6084  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"qarma");return (char *)1;}
6085  strcpy( lDialogString , "qarma" ) ;
6086  if ( !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
6087  {
6088  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
6089  }
6090  }
6091  strcat(lDialogString, " --file-selection --save --confirm-overwrite" ) ;
6092 
6093  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6094  {
6095  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"") ;
6096  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6097  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
6098  }
6099  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6100  {
6101  strcat(lDialogString, " --filename=\"") ;
6102  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPathAndFile) ;
6103  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
6104  }
6105  if ( aNumOfFilterPatterns > 0 )
6106  {
6107  strcat( lDialogString , " --file-filter='" ) ;
6108  if ( aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription) )
6109  {
6110  strcat( lDialogString , aSingleFilterDescription ) ;
6111  strcat( lDialogString , " |" ) ;
6112  }
6113  for ( i = 0 ; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns ; i ++ )
6114  {
6115  strcat( lDialogString , " " ) ;
6116  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[i] ) ;
6117  }
6118  strcat( lDialogString , "' --file-filter='All files | *'" ) ;
6119  }
6120  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat( lDialogString , " 2>/dev/null ");
6121  }
6122  else if (tfd_yadPresent())
6123  {
6124  if (aTitle && !strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")) { strcpy(tinyfd_response, "yad"); return (char*)1; }
6125  strcpy(lDialogString, "yad --file-selection --save --confirm-overwrite");
6126  if (aTitle && strlen(aTitle))
6127  {
6128  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"");
6129  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle);
6130  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
6131  }
6132  if (aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile))
6133  {
6134  strcat(lDialogString, " --filename=\"");
6135  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPathAndFile);
6136  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
6137  }
6138  if (aNumOfFilterPatterns > 0)
6139  {
6140  strcat(lDialogString, " --file-filter='");
6141  if (aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription))
6142  {
6143  strcat(lDialogString, aSingleFilterDescription);
6144  strcat(lDialogString, " |");
6145  }
6146  for (i = 0; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns; i++)
6147  {
6148  strcat(lDialogString, " ");
6149  strcat(lDialogString, aFilterPatterns[i]);
6150  }
6151  strcat(lDialogString, "' --file-filter='All files | *'");
6152  }
6153  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat(lDialogString, " 2>/dev/null ");
6154  }
6155  else if ( !xdialogPresent() && tkinter3Present( ) )
6156  {
6157  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python3-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
6158  strcpy( lDialogString , gPython3Name ) ;
6159  strcat( lDialogString ,
6160  " -S -c \"import tkinter;from tkinter import filedialog;root=tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
6161  strcat( lDialogString , "res=filedialog.asksaveasfilename(");
6162  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6163  {
6164  strcat(lDialogString, "title='") ;
6165  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6166  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
6167  }
6168  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6169  {
6170  getPathWithoutFinalSlash( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6171  if ( strlen(lString) )
6172  {
6173  strcat(lDialogString, "initialdir='") ;
6174  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6175  strcat(lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6176  }
6177  getLastName( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6178  if ( strlen(lString) )
6179  {
6180  strcat(lDialogString, "initialfile='") ;
6181  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6182  strcat(lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6183  }
6184  }
6185  if ( ( aNumOfFilterPatterns > 1 )
6186  || ( (aNumOfFilterPatterns == 1) /* test because poor osx behaviour */
6187  && ( aFilterPatterns[0][strlen(aFilterPatterns[0])-1] != '*' ) ) )
6188  {
6189  strcat(lDialogString , "filetypes=(" ) ;
6190  strcat( lDialogString , "('" ) ;
6191  if ( aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription) )
6192  {
6193  strcat( lDialogString , aSingleFilterDescription ) ;
6194  }
6195  strcat( lDialogString , "',(" ) ;
6196  for ( i = 0 ; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns ; i ++ )
6197  {
6198  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
6199  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[i] ) ;
6200  strcat( lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6201  }
6202  strcat( lDialogString , "))," ) ;
6203  strcat( lDialogString , "('All files','*'))" ) ;
6204  }
6205  strcat( lDialogString, ");\nif not isinstance(res, tuple):\n\tprint(res)\n\"" ) ;
6206  }
6207  else if ( !xdialogPresent() && tkinter2Present( ) )
6208  {
6209  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python2-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
6210  strcpy( lDialogString , "export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8;" ) ;
6211  strcat( lDialogString , gPython2Name ) ;
6212  if ( ! isTerminalRunning( ) && tfd_isDarwin( ))
6213  {
6214  strcat( lDialogString , " -i" ) ; /* for osx without console */
6215  }
6216  strcat( lDialogString ,
6217 " -S -c \"import Tkinter,tkFileDialog;root=Tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
6218 
6219  if ( tfd_isDarwin( ) )
6220  {
6221  strcat( lDialogString ,
6222 "import os;os.system('''/usr/bin/osascript -e 'tell app \\\"Finder\\\" to set\
6223  frontmost of process \\\"Python\\\" to true' ''');");
6224  }
6225 
6226  strcat( lDialogString , "res=tkFileDialog.asksaveasfilename(");
6227  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6228  {
6229  strcat(lDialogString, "title='") ;
6230  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6231  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
6232  }
6233  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6234  {
6235  getPathWithoutFinalSlash( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6236  if ( strlen(lString) )
6237  {
6238  strcat(lDialogString, "initialdir='") ;
6239  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6240  strcat(lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6241  }
6242  getLastName( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6243  if ( strlen(lString) )
6244  {
6245  strcat(lDialogString, "initialfile='") ;
6246  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6247  strcat(lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6248  }
6249  }
6250  if ( ( aNumOfFilterPatterns > 1 )
6251  || ( (aNumOfFilterPatterns == 1) /* test because poor osx behaviour */
6252  && ( aFilterPatterns[0][strlen(aFilterPatterns[0])-1] != '*' ) ) )
6253  {
6254  strcat(lDialogString , "filetypes=(" ) ;
6255  strcat( lDialogString , "('" ) ;
6256  if ( aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription) )
6257  {
6258  strcat( lDialogString , aSingleFilterDescription ) ;
6259  }
6260  strcat( lDialogString , "',(" ) ;
6261  for ( i = 0 ; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns ; i ++ )
6262  {
6263  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
6264  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[i] ) ;
6265  strcat( lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6266  }
6267  strcat( lDialogString , "))," ) ;
6268  strcat( lDialogString , "('All files','*'))" ) ;
6269  }
6270  strcat( lDialogString, ");\nif not isinstance(res, tuple):\n\tprint res \n\"" ) ;
6271  }
6272  else if ( xdialogPresent() || dialogName() )
6273  {
6274  if ( xdialogPresent( ) )
6275  {
6276  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"xdialog");return (char *)1;}
6277  lWasGraphicDialog = 1 ;
6278  strcpy( lDialogString , "(Xdialog " ) ;
6279  }
6280  else if ( isTerminalRunning( ) )
6281  {
6282  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"dialog");return (char *)0;}
6283  strcpy( lDialogString , "(dialog " ) ;
6284  }
6285  else
6286  {
6287  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"dialog");return (char *)0;}
6288  lWasXterm = 1 ;
6289  strcpy( lDialogString , terminalName() ) ;
6290  strcat( lDialogString , "'(" ) ;
6291  strcat( lDialogString , dialogName() ) ;
6292  strcat( lDialogString , " " ) ;
6293  }
6294 
6295  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6296  {
6297  strcat(lDialogString, "--title \"") ;
6298  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6299  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
6300  }
6301 
6302  if ( !xdialogPresent() && !gdialogPresent() )
6303  {
6304  strcat(lDialogString, "--backtitle \"") ;
6305  strcat(lDialogString,
6306  "tab: focus | /: populate | spacebar: fill text field | ok: TEXT FIELD ONLY") ;
6307  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
6308  }
6309 
6310  strcat( lDialogString , "--fselect \"" ) ;
6311  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6312  {
6313  if ( ! strchr(aDefaultPathAndFile, '/') )
6314  {
6315  strcat(lDialogString, "./") ;
6316  }
6317  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPathAndFile) ;
6318  }
6319  else if ( ! isTerminalRunning( ) && !lWasGraphicDialog )
6320  {
6321  strcat(lDialogString, getenv("HOME")) ;
6322  strcat(lDialogString, "/") ;
6323  }
6324  else
6325  {
6326  strcat(lDialogString, "./") ;
6327  }
6328 
6329  if ( lWasGraphicDialog )
6330  {
6331  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 ) 2>&1 ") ;
6332  }
6333  else
6334  {
6335  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 >/dev/tty) ") ;
6336  if ( lWasXterm )
6337  {
6338  strcat( lDialogString ,
6339  "2>/tmp/tinyfd.txt';cat /tmp/tinyfd.txt;rm /tmp/tinyfd.txt");
6340  }
6341  else
6342  {
6343  strcat(lDialogString, "2>&1 ; clear >/dev/tty") ;
6344  }
6345  }
6346  }
6347  else
6348  {
6349  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){return tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle,NULL,NULL);}
6350  strcpy(lBuff, "Save file in ");
6351  strcat(lBuff, getCurDir());
6352  lPointerInputBox = tinyfd_inputBox(NULL, NULL, NULL); /* obtain a pointer on the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
6353  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lString, lPointerInputBox); /* preserve the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
6354  p = tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, lBuff, "");
6355  if (p) strcpy(lBuff, p); else lBuff[0] = '\0';
6356  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lPointerInputBox, lString); /* restore its previous content to tinyfd_inputBox */
6357  p = lBuff;
6358 
6359  getPathWithoutFinalSlash( lString , p ) ;
6360  if ( strlen( lString ) && ! dirExists( lString ) )
6361  {
6362  return NULL ;
6363  }
6364  getLastName(lString,p);
6365  if ( ! strlen(lString) )
6366  {
6367  return NULL;
6368  }
6369  return p ;
6370  }
6371 
6372  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ;
6373  if ( ! ( lIn = popen( lDialogString , "r" ) ) )
6374  {
6375  return NULL ;
6376  }
6377  while ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
6378  {}
6379  pclose( lIn ) ;
6380  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
6381  {
6382  lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
6383  }
6384  /* printf( "lBuff: %s\n" , lBuff ) ; */
6385  if ( ! strlen(lBuff) )
6386  {
6387  return NULL;
6388  }
6389  getPathWithoutFinalSlash( lString , lBuff ) ;
6390  if ( strlen( lString ) && ! dirExists( lString ) )
6391  {
6392  return NULL ;
6393  }
6394  getLastName(lString,lBuff);
6395  if ( ! filenameValid(lString) )
6396  {
6397  return NULL;
6398  }
6399  return lBuff ;
6400 }
6401 
6402 
6403 /* in case of multiple files, the separator is | */
6404 char * tinyfd_openFileDialog(
6405  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
6406  char const * aDefaultPathAndFile , /* NULL or "" */
6407  int aNumOfFilterPatterns , /* 0 */
6408  char const * const * aFilterPatterns , /* NULL or {"*.jpg","*.png"} */
6409  char const * aSingleFilterDescription , /* NULL or "image files" */
6410  int aAllowMultipleSelects ) /* 0 or 1 */
6411 {
6412  char lDialogString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
6413  char lString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
6414  int i ;
6415  FILE * lIn ;
6416  char * p ;
6417  char * lPointerInputBox ;
6418  int lWasKdialog = 0 ;
6419  int lWasGraphicDialog = 0 ;
6420  int lWasXterm = 0 ;
6421  size_t lFullBuffLen ;
6422  static char * lBuff = NULL;
6423 
6424  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_openFileDialog("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription, aAllowMultipleSelects);
6425  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultPathAndFile)) return tinyfd_openFileDialog(aTitle, "INVALID DEFAULT_PATH WITH QUOTES", aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, aSingleFilterDescription, aAllowMultipleSelects);
6426  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aSingleFilterDescription)) return tinyfd_openFileDialog(aTitle, aDefaultPathAndFile, aNumOfFilterPatterns, aFilterPatterns, "INVALID FILTER_DESCRIPTION WITH QUOTES", aAllowMultipleSelects);
6427  for (i = 0; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns; i++)
6428  {
6429  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aFilterPatterns[i])) return tinyfd_openFileDialog("INVALID FILTER_PATTERN WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPathAndFile, 0, NULL, NULL, aAllowMultipleSelects);
6430  }
6431 
6432  free(lBuff);
6433  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query"))
6434  {
6435  lBuff = NULL;
6436  }
6437  else
6438  {
6439  if (aAllowMultipleSelects)
6440  {
6441  lFullBuffLen = MAX_MULTIPLE_FILES * MAX_PATH_OR_CMD + 1;
6442  lBuff = (char *)(malloc(lFullBuffLen * sizeof(char)));
6443  if (!lBuff)
6444  {
6445  lFullBuffLen = LOW_MULTIPLE_FILES * MAX_PATH_OR_CMD + 1;
6446  lBuff = (char *)( malloc( lFullBuffLen * sizeof(char)));
6447  }
6448  }
6449  else
6450  {
6451  lFullBuffLen = MAX_PATH_OR_CMD + 1;
6452  lBuff = (char *)(malloc(lFullBuffLen * sizeof(char)));
6453  }
6454  if (!lBuff) return NULL;
6455  lBuff[0]='\0';
6456  }
6457 
6458  if ( osascriptPresent( ) )
6459  {
6460  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"applescript");return (char *)1;}
6461  strcpy( lDialogString , "osascript ");
6462  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'tell application \"System Events\"' -e 'Activate'");
6463  strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'try' -e '" );
6464  if ( ! aAllowMultipleSelects )
6465  {
6466 
6467 
6468  strcat( lDialogString , "POSIX path of ( " );
6469  }
6470  else
6471  {
6472  strcat( lDialogString , "set mylist to " );
6473  }
6474  strcat( lDialogString , "choose file " );
6475  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6476  {
6477  strcat(lDialogString, "with prompt \"") ;
6478  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6479  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
6480  }
6481  getPathWithoutFinalSlash( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6482  if ( strlen(lString) )
6483  {
6484  strcat(lDialogString, "default location \"") ;
6485  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6486  strcat(lDialogString , "\" " ) ;
6487  }
6488  if ( aNumOfFilterPatterns > 0 )
6489  {
6490  strcat(lDialogString , "of type {\"" );
6491  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[0] + 2 ) ;
6492  strcat( lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
6493  for ( i = 1 ; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns ; i ++ )
6494  {
6495  strcat( lDialogString , ",\"" ) ;
6496  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[i] + 2) ;
6497  strcat( lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
6498  }
6499  strcat( lDialogString , "} " ) ;
6500  }
6501  if ( aAllowMultipleSelects )
6502  {
6503  strcat( lDialogString , "multiple selections allowed true ' " ) ;
6504  strcat( lDialogString ,
6505  "-e 'set mystring to POSIX path of item 1 of mylist' " );
6506  strcat( lDialogString ,
6507  "-e 'repeat with i from 2 to the count of mylist' " );
6508  strcat( lDialogString , "-e 'set mystring to mystring & \"|\"' " );
6509  strcat( lDialogString ,
6510  "-e 'set mystring to mystring & POSIX path of item i of mylist' " );
6511  strcat( lDialogString , "-e 'end repeat' " );
6512  strcat( lDialogString , "-e 'mystring' " );
6513  }
6514  else
6515  {
6516  strcat( lDialogString , ")' " ) ;
6517  }
6518  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'on error number -128' " ) ;
6519  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'end try'") ;
6520  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString, " -e 'end tell'") ;
6521  }
6522  else if ( tfd_kdialogPresent() )
6523  {
6524  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"kdialog");return (char *)1;}
6525  lWasKdialog = 1 ;
6526 
6527  strcpy( lDialogString , "kdialog" ) ;
6528  if ( (tfd_kdialogPresent() == 2) && tfd_xpropPresent() )
6529  {
6530  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
6531  }
6532  strcat( lDialogString , " --getopenfilename " ) ;
6533 
6534  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6535  {
6536  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile[0] != '/' )
6537  {
6538  strcat(lDialogString, "$PWD/") ;
6539  }
6540  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
6541  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6542  strcat(lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
6543  }
6544  else
6545  {
6546  strcat(lDialogString, "$PWD/") ;
6547  }
6548 
6549  if ( aNumOfFilterPatterns > 0 )
6550  {
6551  strcat(lDialogString , " \"" ) ;
6552  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[0] ) ;
6553  for ( i = 1 ; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns ; i ++ )
6554  {
6555  strcat( lDialogString , " " ) ;
6556  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[i] ) ;
6557  }
6558  if ( aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription) )
6559  {
6560  strcat( lDialogString , " | " ) ;
6561  strcat( lDialogString , aSingleFilterDescription ) ;
6562  }
6563  strcat( lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
6564  }
6565  if ( aAllowMultipleSelects )
6566  {
6567  strcat( lDialogString , " --multiple --separate-output" ) ;
6568  }
6569  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6570  {
6571  strcat(lDialogString, " --title \"") ;
6572  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6573  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
6574  }
6575  }
6576  else if ( tfd_zenityPresent() || tfd_matedialogPresent() || tfd_shellementaryPresent() || tfd_qarmaPresent() )
6577  {
6578  if ( tfd_zenityPresent() )
6579  {
6580  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"zenity");return (char *)1;}
6581  strcpy( lDialogString , "zenity" ) ;
6582  if ( (tfd_zenity3Present() >= 4) && !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
6583  {
6584  strcat( lDialogString, " --attach=$(sleep .01;xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
6585  }
6586  }
6587  else if ( tfd_matedialogPresent() )
6588  {
6589  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"matedialog");return (char *)1;}
6590  strcpy( lDialogString , "matedialog" ) ;
6591  }
6592  else if ( tfd_shellementaryPresent() )
6593  {
6594  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"shellementary");return (char *)1;}
6595  strcpy( lDialogString , "shellementary" ) ;
6596  }
6597  else
6598  {
6599  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"qarma");return (char *)1;}
6600  strcpy( lDialogString , "qarma" ) ;
6601  if ( !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
6602  {
6603  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
6604  }
6605  }
6606  strcat( lDialogString , " --file-selection" ) ;
6607 
6608  if ( aAllowMultipleSelects )
6609  {
6610  strcat( lDialogString , " --multiple" ) ;
6611  }
6612  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6613  {
6614  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"") ;
6615  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6616  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
6617  }
6618  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6619  {
6620  strcat(lDialogString, " --filename=\"") ;
6621  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPathAndFile) ;
6622  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
6623  }
6624  if ( aNumOfFilterPatterns > 0 )
6625  {
6626  strcat( lDialogString , " --file-filter='" ) ;
6627  if ( aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription) )
6628  {
6629  strcat( lDialogString , aSingleFilterDescription ) ;
6630  strcat( lDialogString , " |" ) ;
6631  }
6632  for ( i = 0 ; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns ; i ++ )
6633  {
6634  strcat( lDialogString , " " ) ;
6635  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[i] ) ;
6636  }
6637  strcat( lDialogString , "' --file-filter='All files | *'" ) ;
6638  }
6639  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat( lDialogString , " 2>/dev/null ");
6640  }
6641  else if (tfd_yadPresent())
6642  {
6643  if (aTitle && !strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")) { strcpy(tinyfd_response, "yad"); return (char*)1; }
6644  strcpy(lDialogString, "yad --file-selection");
6645  if (aAllowMultipleSelects)
6646  {
6647  strcat(lDialogString, " --multiple");
6648  }
6649  if (aTitle && strlen(aTitle))
6650  {
6651  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"");
6652  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle);
6653  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
6654  }
6655  if (aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile))
6656  {
6657  strcat(lDialogString, " --filename=\"");
6658  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPathAndFile);
6659  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
6660  }
6661  if (aNumOfFilterPatterns > 0)
6662  {
6663  strcat(lDialogString, " --file-filter='");
6664  if (aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription))
6665  {
6666  strcat(lDialogString, aSingleFilterDescription);
6667  strcat(lDialogString, " |");
6668  }
6669  for (i = 0; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns; i++)
6670  {
6671  strcat(lDialogString, " ");
6672  strcat(lDialogString, aFilterPatterns[i]);
6673  }
6674  strcat(lDialogString, "' --file-filter='All files | *'");
6675  }
6676  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat(lDialogString, " 2>/dev/null ");
6677  }
6678  else if ( tkinter3Present( ) )
6679  {
6680  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python3-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
6681  strcpy( lDialogString , gPython3Name ) ;
6682  strcat( lDialogString ,
6683  " -S -c \"import tkinter;from tkinter import filedialog;root=tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
6684  strcat( lDialogString , "lFiles=filedialog.askopenfilename(");
6685  if ( aAllowMultipleSelects )
6686  {
6687  strcat( lDialogString , "multiple=1," ) ;
6688  }
6689  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6690  {
6691  strcat(lDialogString, "title='") ;
6692  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6693  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
6694  }
6695  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6696  {
6697  getPathWithoutFinalSlash( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6698  if ( strlen(lString) )
6699  {
6700  strcat(lDialogString, "initialdir='") ;
6701  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6702  strcat(lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6703  }
6704  getLastName( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6705  if ( strlen(lString) )
6706  {
6707  strcat(lDialogString, "initialfile='") ;
6708  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6709  strcat(lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6710  }
6711  }
6712  if ( ( aNumOfFilterPatterns > 1 )
6713  || ( ( aNumOfFilterPatterns == 1 ) /*test because poor osx behaviour*/
6714  && ( aFilterPatterns[0][strlen(aFilterPatterns[0])-1] != '*' ) ) )
6715  {
6716  strcat(lDialogString , "filetypes=(" ) ;
6717  strcat( lDialogString , "('" ) ;
6718  if ( aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription) )
6719  {
6720  strcat( lDialogString , aSingleFilterDescription ) ;
6721  }
6722  strcat( lDialogString , "',(" ) ;
6723  for ( i = 0 ; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns ; i ++ )
6724  {
6725  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
6726  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[i] ) ;
6727  strcat( lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6728  }
6729  strcat( lDialogString , "))," ) ;
6730  strcat( lDialogString , "('All files','*'))" ) ;
6731  }
6732  strcat( lDialogString , ");\
6733 \nif not isinstance(lFiles, tuple):\n\tprint(lFiles)\nelse:\
6734 \n\tlFilesString=''\n\tfor lFile in lFiles:\n\t\tlFilesString+=str(lFile)+'|'\
6735 \n\tprint(lFilesString[:-1])\n\"" ) ;
6736  }
6737  else if ( tkinter2Present( ) )
6738  {
6739  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python2-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
6740  strcpy( lDialogString , "export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8;" ) ;
6741  strcat( lDialogString , gPython2Name ) ;
6742  if ( ! isTerminalRunning( ) && tfd_isDarwin( ) )
6743  {
6744  strcat( lDialogString , " -i" ) ; /* for osx without console */
6745  }
6746  strcat( lDialogString ,
6747 " -S -c \"import Tkinter,tkFileDialog;root=Tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
6748 
6749  if ( tfd_isDarwin( ) )
6750  {
6751  strcat( lDialogString ,
6752 "import os;os.system('''/usr/bin/osascript -e 'tell app \\\"Finder\\\" to set \
6753 frontmost of process \\\"Python\\\" to true' ''');");
6754  }
6755  strcat( lDialogString , "lFiles=tkFileDialog.askopenfilename(");
6756  if ( aAllowMultipleSelects )
6757  {
6758  strcat( lDialogString , "multiple=1," ) ;
6759  }
6760  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6761  {
6762  strcat(lDialogString, "title='") ;
6763  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6764  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
6765  }
6766  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6767  {
6768  getPathWithoutFinalSlash( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6769  if ( strlen(lString) )
6770  {
6771  strcat(lDialogString, "initialdir='") ;
6772  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6773  strcat(lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6774  }
6775  getLastName( lString , aDefaultPathAndFile ) ;
6776  if ( strlen(lString) )
6777  {
6778  strcat(lDialogString, "initialfile='") ;
6779  strcat(lDialogString, lString ) ;
6780  strcat(lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6781  }
6782  }
6783  if ( ( aNumOfFilterPatterns > 1 )
6784  || ( ( aNumOfFilterPatterns == 1 ) /*test because poor osx behaviour*/
6785  && ( aFilterPatterns[0][strlen(aFilterPatterns[0])-1] != '*' ) ) )
6786  {
6787  strcat(lDialogString , "filetypes=(" ) ;
6788  strcat( lDialogString , "('" ) ;
6789  if ( aSingleFilterDescription && strlen(aSingleFilterDescription) )
6790  {
6791  strcat( lDialogString , aSingleFilterDescription ) ;
6792  }
6793  strcat( lDialogString , "',(" ) ;
6794  for ( i = 0 ; i < aNumOfFilterPatterns ; i ++ )
6795  {
6796  strcat( lDialogString , "'" ) ;
6797  strcat( lDialogString , aFilterPatterns[i] ) ;
6798  strcat( lDialogString , "'," ) ;
6799  }
6800  strcat( lDialogString , "))," ) ;
6801  strcat( lDialogString , "('All files','*'))" ) ;
6802  }
6803  strcat( lDialogString , ");\
6804 \nif not isinstance(lFiles, tuple):\n\tprint lFiles\nelse:\
6805 \n\tlFilesString=''\n\tfor lFile in lFiles:\n\t\tlFilesString+=str(lFile)+'|'\
6806 \n\tprint lFilesString[:-1]\n\"" ) ;
6807  }
6808  else if ( xdialogPresent() || dialogName() )
6809  {
6810  if ( xdialogPresent( ) )
6811  {
6812  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"xdialog");return (char *)1;}
6813  lWasGraphicDialog = 1 ;
6814  strcpy( lDialogString , "(Xdialog " ) ;
6815  }
6816  else if ( isTerminalRunning( ) )
6817  {
6818  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"dialog");return (char *)0;}
6819  strcpy( lDialogString , "(dialog " ) ;
6820  }
6821  else
6822  {
6823  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"dialog");return (char *)0;}
6824  lWasXterm = 1 ;
6825  strcpy( lDialogString , terminalName() ) ;
6826  strcat( lDialogString , "'(" ) ;
6827  strcat( lDialogString , dialogName() ) ;
6828  strcat( lDialogString , " " ) ;
6829  }
6830 
6831  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6832  {
6833  strcat(lDialogString, "--title \"") ;
6834  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6835  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
6836  }
6837 
6838  if ( !xdialogPresent() && !gdialogPresent() )
6839  {
6840  strcat(lDialogString, "--backtitle \"") ;
6841  strcat(lDialogString,
6842  "tab: focus | /: populate | spacebar: fill text field | ok: TEXT FIELD ONLY") ;
6843  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
6844  }
6845 
6846  strcat( lDialogString , "--fselect \"" ) ;
6847  if ( aDefaultPathAndFile && strlen(aDefaultPathAndFile) )
6848  {
6849  if ( ! strchr(aDefaultPathAndFile, '/') )
6850  {
6851  strcat(lDialogString, "./") ;
6852  }
6853  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPathAndFile) ;
6854  }
6855  else if ( ! isTerminalRunning( ) && !lWasGraphicDialog )
6856  {
6857  strcat(lDialogString, getenv("HOME")) ;
6858  strcat(lDialogString, "/");
6859  }
6860  else
6861  {
6862  strcat(lDialogString, "./") ;
6863  }
6864 
6865  if ( lWasGraphicDialog )
6866  {
6867  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 ) 2>&1 ") ;
6868  }
6869  else
6870  {
6871  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 >/dev/tty) ") ;
6872  if ( lWasXterm )
6873  {
6874  strcat( lDialogString ,
6875  "2>/tmp/tinyfd.txt';cat /tmp/tinyfd.txt;rm /tmp/tinyfd.txt");
6876  }
6877  else
6878  {
6879  strcat(lDialogString, "2>&1 ; clear >/dev/tty") ;
6880  }
6881  }
6882  }
6883  else
6884  {
6885  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){return tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle,NULL,NULL);}
6886  strcpy(lBuff, "Open file from ");
6887  strcat(lBuff, getCurDir());
6888  lPointerInputBox = tinyfd_inputBox(NULL, NULL, NULL); /* obtain a pointer on the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
6889  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lDialogString, lPointerInputBox); /* preserve the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
6890  p = tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, lBuff, "");
6891  if ( p ) strcpy(lBuff, p); else lBuff[0] = '\0';
6892  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lPointerInputBox, lDialogString); /* restore its previous content to tinyfd_inputBox */
6893  if ( ! fileExists(lBuff) )
6894  {
6895  free(lBuff);
6896  lBuff = NULL;
6897  }
6898  else
6899  {
6900  lBuff = (char *)( realloc( lBuff, (strlen(lBuff)+1) * sizeof(char)));
6901  }
6902  return lBuff ;
6903  }
6904 
6905  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ;
6906  if ( ! ( lIn = popen( lDialogString , "r" ) ) )
6907  {
6908  free(lBuff);
6909  lBuff = NULL;
6910  return NULL ;
6911  }
6912  lBuff[0]='\0';
6913  p = lBuff;
6914  while ( fgets( p , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
6915  {
6916  p += strlen( p );
6917  }
6918  pclose( lIn ) ;
6919  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
6920  {
6921  lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
6922  }
6923  /* printf( "lBuff: %s\n" , lBuff ) ; */
6924  if ( lWasKdialog && aAllowMultipleSelects )
6925  {
6926  p = lBuff ;
6927  while ( ( p = strchr( p , '\n' ) ) )
6928  * p = '|' ;
6929  }
6930  /* printf( "lBuff2: %s\n" , lBuff ) ; */
6931  if ( ! strlen( lBuff ) )
6932  {
6933  free(lBuff);
6934  lBuff = NULL;
6935  return NULL;
6936  }
6937  if ( aAllowMultipleSelects && strchr(lBuff, '|') )
6938  {
6939  if( ! ensureFilesExist( lBuff , lBuff ) )
6940  {
6941  free(lBuff);
6942  lBuff = NULL;
6943  return NULL;
6944  }
6945  }
6946  else if ( !fileExists(lBuff) )
6947  {
6948  free(lBuff);
6949  lBuff = NULL;
6950  return NULL;
6951  }
6952 
6953  lBuff = (char *)( realloc( lBuff, (strlen(lBuff)+1) * sizeof(char)));
6954 
6955  /*printf( "lBuff3: %s\n" , lBuff ) ; */
6956  return lBuff ;
6957 }
6958 
6959 
6960 char * tinyfd_selectFolderDialog(
6961  char const * aTitle , /* "" */
6962  char const * aDefaultPath ) /* "" */
6963 {
6964  static char lBuff[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
6965  char lDialogString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
6966  FILE * lIn ;
6967  char * p ;
6968  char * lPointerInputBox ;
6969  int lWasGraphicDialog = 0 ;
6970  int lWasXterm = 0 ;
6971  lBuff[0]='\0';
6972 
6973  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_selectFolderDialog("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultPath);
6974  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultPath)) return tinyfd_selectFolderDialog(aTitle, "INVALID DEFAULT_PATH WITH QUOTES");
6975 
6976  if ( osascriptPresent( ))
6977  {
6978  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"applescript");return (char *)1;}
6979  strcpy( lDialogString , "osascript ");
6980  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'tell application \"System Events\"' -e 'Activate'");
6981  strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'try' -e 'POSIX path of ( choose folder ");
6982  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
6983  {
6984  strcat(lDialogString, "with prompt \"") ;
6985  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
6986  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
6987  }
6988  if ( aDefaultPath && strlen(aDefaultPath) )
6989  {
6990  strcat(lDialogString, "default location \"") ;
6991  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPath ) ;
6992  strcat(lDialogString , "\" " ) ;
6993  }
6994  strcat( lDialogString , ")' " ) ;
6995  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'on error number -128' " ) ;
6996  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'end try'") ;
6997  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString, " -e 'end tell'") ;
6998  }
6999  else if ( tfd_kdialogPresent() )
7000  {
7001  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"kdialog");return (char *)1;}
7002  strcpy( lDialogString , "kdialog" ) ;
7003  if ( (tfd_kdialogPresent() == 2) && tfd_xpropPresent() )
7004  {
7005  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
7006  }
7007  strcat( lDialogString , " --getexistingdirectory " ) ;
7008 
7009  if ( aDefaultPath && strlen(aDefaultPath) )
7010  {
7011  if ( aDefaultPath[0] != '/' )
7012  {
7013  strcat(lDialogString, "$PWD/") ;
7014  }
7015  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
7016  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPath ) ;
7017  strcat(lDialogString , "\"" ) ;
7018  }
7019  else
7020  {
7021  strcat(lDialogString, "$PWD/") ;
7022  }
7023 
7024  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7025  {
7026  strcat(lDialogString, " --title \"") ;
7027  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7028  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
7029  }
7030  }
7031  else if ( tfd_zenityPresent() || tfd_matedialogPresent() || tfd_shellementaryPresent() || tfd_qarmaPresent() )
7032  {
7033  if ( tfd_zenityPresent() )
7034  {
7035  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"zenity");return (char *)1;}
7036  strcpy( lDialogString , "zenity" ) ;
7037  if ( (tfd_zenity3Present() >= 4) && !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
7038  {
7039  strcat( lDialogString, " --attach=$(sleep .01;xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
7040  }
7041  }
7042  else if ( tfd_matedialogPresent() )
7043  {
7044  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"matedialog");return (char *)1;}
7045  strcpy( lDialogString , "matedialog" ) ;
7046  }
7047  else if ( tfd_shellementaryPresent() )
7048  {
7049  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"shellementary");return (char *)1;}
7050  strcpy( lDialogString , "shellementary" ) ;
7051  }
7052  else
7053  {
7054  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"qarma");return (char *)1;}
7055  strcpy( lDialogString , "qarma" ) ;
7056  if ( !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
7057  {
7058  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
7059  }
7060  }
7061  strcat( lDialogString , " --file-selection --directory" ) ;
7062 
7063  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7064  {
7065  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"") ;
7066  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7067  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
7068  }
7069  if ( aDefaultPath && strlen(aDefaultPath) )
7070  {
7071  strcat(lDialogString, " --filename=\"") ;
7072  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPath) ;
7073  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
7074  }
7075  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat( lDialogString , " 2>/dev/null ");
7076  }
7077  else if (tfd_yadPresent())
7078  {
7079  if (aTitle && !strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")) { strcpy(tinyfd_response, "yad"); return (char*)1; }
7080  strcpy(lDialogString, "yad --file-selection --directory");
7081  if (aTitle && strlen(aTitle))
7082  {
7083  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"");
7084  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle);
7085  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
7086  }
7087  if (aDefaultPath && strlen(aDefaultPath))
7088  {
7089  strcat(lDialogString, " --filename=\"");
7090  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPath);
7091  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
7092  }
7093  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat(lDialogString, " 2>/dev/null ");
7094  }
7095  else if ( !xdialogPresent() && tkinter3Present( ) )
7096  {
7097  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python3-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
7098  strcpy( lDialogString , gPython3Name ) ;
7099  strcat( lDialogString ,
7100  " -S -c \"import tkinter;from tkinter import filedialog;root=tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
7101  strcat( lDialogString , "res=filedialog.askdirectory(");
7102  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7103  {
7104  strcat(lDialogString, "title='") ;
7105  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7106  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
7107  }
7108  if ( aDefaultPath && strlen(aDefaultPath) )
7109  {
7110  strcat(lDialogString, "initialdir='") ;
7111  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPath ) ;
7112  strcat(lDialogString , "'" ) ;
7113  }
7114  strcat( lDialogString, ");\nif not isinstance(res, tuple):\n\tprint(res)\n\"" ) ;
7115  }
7116  else if ( !xdialogPresent() && tkinter2Present( ) )
7117  {
7118  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python2-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
7119  strcpy( lDialogString , "export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8;" ) ;
7120  strcat( lDialogString , gPython2Name ) ;
7121  if ( ! isTerminalRunning( ) && tfd_isDarwin( ) )
7122  {
7123  strcat( lDialogString , " -i" ) ; /* for osx without console */
7124  }
7125  strcat( lDialogString ,
7126 " -S -c \"import Tkinter,tkFileDialog;root=Tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
7127 
7128  if ( tfd_isDarwin( ) )
7129  {
7130  strcat( lDialogString ,
7131 "import os;os.system('''/usr/bin/osascript -e 'tell app \\\"Finder\\\" to set \
7132 frontmost of process \\\"Python\\\" to true' ''');");
7133  }
7134 
7135  strcat( lDialogString , "print tkFileDialog.askdirectory(");
7136  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7137  {
7138  strcat(lDialogString, "title='") ;
7139  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7140  strcat(lDialogString, "',") ;
7141  }
7142  if ( aDefaultPath && strlen(aDefaultPath) )
7143  {
7144  strcat(lDialogString, "initialdir='") ;
7145  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPath ) ;
7146  strcat(lDialogString , "'" ) ;
7147  }
7148  strcat( lDialogString , ")\"" ) ;
7149  }
7150  else if ( xdialogPresent() || dialogName() )
7151  {
7152  if ( xdialogPresent( ) )
7153  {
7154  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"xdialog");return (char *)1;}
7155  lWasGraphicDialog = 1 ;
7156  strcpy( lDialogString , "(Xdialog " ) ;
7157  }
7158  else if ( isTerminalRunning( ) )
7159  {
7160  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"dialog");return (char *)0;}
7161  strcpy( lDialogString , "(dialog " ) ;
7162  }
7163  else
7164  {
7165  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"dialog");return (char *)0;}
7166  lWasXterm = 1 ;
7167  strcpy( lDialogString , terminalName() ) ;
7168  strcat( lDialogString , "'(" ) ;
7169  strcat( lDialogString , dialogName() ) ;
7170  strcat( lDialogString , " " ) ;
7171  }
7172 
7173  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7174  {
7175  strcat(lDialogString, "--title \"") ;
7176  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7177  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
7178  }
7179 
7180  if ( !xdialogPresent() && !gdialogPresent() )
7181  {
7182  strcat(lDialogString, "--backtitle \"") ;
7183  strcat(lDialogString,
7184  "tab: focus | /: populate | spacebar: fill text field | ok: TEXT FIELD ONLY") ;
7185  strcat(lDialogString, "\" ") ;
7186  }
7187 
7188  strcat( lDialogString , "--dselect \"" ) ;
7189  if ( aDefaultPath && strlen(aDefaultPath) )
7190  {
7191  strcat(lDialogString, aDefaultPath) ;
7192  ensureFinalSlash(lDialogString);
7193  }
7194  else if ( ! isTerminalRunning( ) && !lWasGraphicDialog )
7195  {
7196  strcat(lDialogString, getenv("HOME")) ;
7197  strcat(lDialogString, "/");
7198  }
7199  else
7200  {
7201  strcat(lDialogString, "./") ;
7202  }
7203 
7204  if ( lWasGraphicDialog )
7205  {
7206  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 ) 2>&1 ") ;
7207  }
7208  else
7209  {
7210  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 >/dev/tty) ") ;
7211  if ( lWasXterm )
7212  {
7213  strcat( lDialogString ,
7214  "2>/tmp/tinyfd.txt';cat /tmp/tinyfd.txt;rm /tmp/tinyfd.txt");
7215  }
7216  else
7217  {
7218  strcat(lDialogString, "2>&1 ; clear >/dev/tty") ;
7219  }
7220  }
7221  }
7222  else
7223  {
7224  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){return tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle,NULL,NULL);}
7225  strcpy(lBuff, "Select folder from ");
7226  strcat(lBuff, getCurDir());
7227  lPointerInputBox = tinyfd_inputBox(NULL, NULL, NULL); /* obtain a pointer on the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
7228  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lDialogString, lPointerInputBox); /* preserve the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
7229  p = tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, lBuff, "");
7230  if (p) strcpy(lBuff, p); else lBuff[0] = '\0';
7231  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lPointerInputBox, lDialogString); /* restore its previous content to tinyfd_inputBox */
7232  p = lBuff;
7233 
7234  if ( !p || ! strlen( p ) || ! dirExists( p ) )
7235  {
7236  return NULL ;
7237  }
7238  return p ;
7239  }
7240  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ;
7241  if ( ! ( lIn = popen( lDialogString , "r" ) ) )
7242  {
7243  return NULL ;
7244  }
7245  while ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
7246  {}
7247  pclose( lIn ) ;
7248  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
7249  {
7250  lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
7251  }
7252  /* printf( "lBuff: %s\n" , lBuff ) ; */
7253  if ( ! strlen( lBuff ) || ! dirExists( lBuff ) )
7254  {
7255  return NULL ;
7256  }
7257  return lBuff ;
7258 }
7259 
7260 
7261 /* returns the hexcolor as a string "#FF0000" */
7262 /* aoResultRGB also contains the result */
7263 /* aDefaultRGB is used only if aDefaultHexRGB is NULL */
7264 /* aDefaultRGB and aoResultRGB can be the same array */
7265 char * tinyfd_colorChooser(
7266  char const * aTitle , /* NULL or "" */
7267  char const * aDefaultHexRGB , /* NULL or "#FF0000"*/
7268  unsigned char const aDefaultRGB[3] , /* { 0 , 255 , 255 } */
7269  unsigned char aoResultRGB[3] ) /* { 0 , 0 , 0 } */
7270 {
7271  static char lDefaultHexRGB[16];
7272  char lBuff[128] ;
7273 
7274  char lTmp[128] ;
7275 #if !((defined(__cplusplus ) && __cplusplus >= 201103L) || (defined(__STDC_VERSION__) && __STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L) || defined(__clang__))
7276  char * lTmp2 ;
7277 #endif
7278  char lDialogString[MAX_PATH_OR_CMD] ;
7279  unsigned char lDefaultRGB[3];
7280  char * p;
7281  char * lPointerInputBox;
7282  FILE * lIn ;
7283  int i ;
7284  int lWasZenity3 = 0 ;
7285  int lWasOsascript = 0 ;
7286  int lWasXdialog = 0 ;
7287  lBuff[0]='\0';
7288 
7289  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aTitle)) return tinyfd_colorChooser("INVALID TITLE WITH QUOTES", aDefaultHexRGB, aDefaultRGB, aoResultRGB);
7290  if (tfd_quoteDetected(aDefaultHexRGB)) return tinyfd_colorChooser(aTitle, "INVALID DEFAULT_HEX_RGB WITH QUOTES", aDefaultRGB, aoResultRGB);
7291 
7292  if (aDefaultHexRGB)
7293  {
7294  Hex2RGB(aDefaultHexRGB, lDefaultRGB);
7295  strcpy(lDefaultHexRGB, aDefaultHexRGB);
7296  }
7297  else
7298  {
7299  lDefaultRGB[0] = aDefaultRGB[0];
7300  lDefaultRGB[1] = aDefaultRGB[1];
7301  lDefaultRGB[2] = aDefaultRGB[2];
7302  RGB2Hex(aDefaultRGB, lDefaultHexRGB);
7303  }
7304 
7305  if ( osascriptPresent( ) )
7306  {
7307  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"applescript");return (char *)1;}
7308  lWasOsascript = 1 ;
7309  strcpy( lDialogString , "osascript");
7310 
7311  if ( ! osx9orBetter() )
7312  {
7313  strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'tell application \"System Events\"' -e 'Activate'");
7314  strcat( lDialogString , " -e 'try' -e 'set mycolor to choose color default color {");
7315  }
7316  else
7317  {
7318  strcat( lDialogString ,
7319 " -e 'try' -e 'tell app (path to frontmost application as Unicode text) \
7320 to set mycolor to choose color default color {");
7321  }
7322 
7323  sprintf(lTmp, "%d", 256 * lDefaultRGB[0] ) ;
7324  strcat(lDialogString, lTmp ) ;
7325  strcat(lDialogString, "," ) ;
7326  sprintf(lTmp, "%d", 256 * lDefaultRGB[1] ) ;
7327  strcat(lDialogString, lTmp ) ;
7328  strcat(lDialogString, "," ) ;
7329  sprintf(lTmp, "%d", 256 * lDefaultRGB[2] ) ;
7330  strcat(lDialogString, lTmp ) ;
7331  strcat(lDialogString, "}' " ) ;
7332  strcat( lDialogString ,
7333 "-e 'set mystring to ((item 1 of mycolor) div 256 as integer) as string' " );
7334  strcat( lDialogString ,
7335 "-e 'repeat with i from 2 to the count of mycolor' " );
7336  strcat( lDialogString ,
7337 "-e 'set mystring to mystring & \" \" & ((item i of mycolor) div 256 as integer) as string' " );
7338  strcat( lDialogString , "-e 'end repeat' " );
7339  strcat( lDialogString , "-e 'mystring' ");
7340  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'on error number -128' " ) ;
7341  strcat(lDialogString, "-e 'end try'") ;
7342  if ( ! osx9orBetter() ) strcat( lDialogString, " -e 'end tell'") ;
7343  }
7344  else if ( tfd_kdialogPresent() )
7345  {
7346  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"kdialog");return (char *)1;}
7347  strcpy( lDialogString , "kdialog" ) ;
7348  if ( (tfd_kdialogPresent() == 2) && tfd_xpropPresent() )
7349  {
7350  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
7351  }
7352  sprintf( lDialogString + strlen(lDialogString) , " --getcolor --default '%s'" , lDefaultHexRGB ) ;
7353 
7354  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7355  {
7356  strcat(lDialogString, " --title \"") ;
7357  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7358  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
7359  }
7360  }
7361  else if ( tfd_zenity3Present() || tfd_matedialogPresent() || tfd_shellementaryPresent() || tfd_qarmaPresent() )
7362  {
7363  lWasZenity3 = 1 ;
7364  if ( tfd_zenity3Present() )
7365  {
7366  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"zenity3");return (char *)1;}
7367  strcpy( lDialogString , "zenity" );
7368  if ( (tfd_zenity3Present() >= 4) && !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
7369  {
7370  strcat( lDialogString, " --attach=$(sleep .01;xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
7371  }
7372  }
7373  else if ( tfd_matedialogPresent() )
7374  {
7375  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"matedialog");return (char *)1;}
7376  strcpy( lDialogString , "matedialog" ) ;
7377  }
7378  else if ( tfd_shellementaryPresent() )
7379  {
7380  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"shellementary");return (char *)1;}
7381  strcpy( lDialogString , "shellementary" ) ;
7382  }
7383  else
7384  {
7385  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"qarma");return (char *)1;}
7386  strcpy( lDialogString , "qarma" ) ;
7387  if ( !getenv("SSH_TTY") && tfd_xpropPresent() )
7388  {
7389  strcat(lDialogString, " --attach=$(xprop -root 32x '\t$0' _NET_ACTIVE_WINDOW | cut -f 2)"); /* contribution: Paul Rouget */
7390  }
7391  }
7392  strcat( lDialogString , " --color-selection --show-palette" ) ;
7393  sprintf( lDialogString + strlen(lDialogString), " --color=%s" , lDefaultHexRGB ) ;
7394 
7395  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7396  {
7397  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"") ;
7398  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7399  strcat(lDialogString, "\"") ;
7400  }
7401  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat( lDialogString , " 2>/dev/null ");
7402  }
7403  else if (tfd_yadPresent())
7404  {
7405  if (aTitle && !strcmp(aTitle, "tinyfd_query")) { strcpy(tinyfd_response, "yad"); return (char*)1; }
7406  strcpy(lDialogString, "yad --color");
7407  sprintf(lDialogString + strlen(lDialogString), " --init-color=%s", lDefaultHexRGB);
7408  if (aTitle && strlen(aTitle))
7409  {
7410  strcat(lDialogString, " --title=\"");
7411  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle);
7412  strcat(lDialogString, "\"");
7413  }
7414  if (tinyfd_silent) strcat(lDialogString, " 2>/dev/null ");
7415  }
7416  else if ( xdialogPresent() )
7417  {
7418  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"xdialog");return (char *)1;}
7419  lWasXdialog = 1 ;
7420  strcpy( lDialogString , "Xdialog --colorsel \"" ) ;
7421  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7422  {
7423  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7424  }
7425  strcat(lDialogString, "\" 0 60 ") ;
7426 #if (defined(__cplusplus ) && __cplusplus >= 201103L) || (defined(__STDC_VERSION__) && __STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L) || defined(__clang__)
7427  sprintf(lTmp,"%hhu %hhu %hhu",lDefaultRGB[0],lDefaultRGB[1],lDefaultRGB[2]);
7428 #else
7429  sprintf(lTmp,"%hu %hu %hu",lDefaultRGB[0],lDefaultRGB[1],lDefaultRGB[2]);
7430 #endif
7431  strcat(lDialogString, lTmp) ;
7432  strcat(lDialogString, " 2>&1");
7433  }
7434  else if ( tkinter3Present( ) )
7435  {
7436  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python3-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
7437  strcpy( lDialogString , gPython3Name ) ;
7438  strcat( lDialogString ,
7439  " -S -c \"import tkinter;from tkinter import colorchooser;root=tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
7440  strcat( lDialogString , "res=colorchooser.askcolor(color='" ) ;
7441  strcat(lDialogString, lDefaultHexRGB ) ;
7442  strcat(lDialogString, "'") ;
7443 
7444  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7445  {
7446  strcat(lDialogString, ",title='") ;
7447  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7448  strcat(lDialogString, "'") ;
7449  }
7450  strcat( lDialogString , ");\
7451 \nif res[1] is not None:\n\tprint(res[1])\"" ) ;
7452  }
7453  else if ( tkinter2Present( ) )
7454  {
7455  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){strcpy(tinyfd_response,"python2-tkinter");return (char *)1;}
7456  strcpy( lDialogString , "export PYTHONIOENCODING=utf-8;" ) ;
7457  strcat( lDialogString , gPython2Name ) ;
7458  if ( ! isTerminalRunning( ) && tfd_isDarwin( ) )
7459  {
7460  strcat( lDialogString , " -i" ) ; /* for osx without console */
7461  }
7462 
7463  strcat( lDialogString ,
7464 " -S -c \"import Tkinter,tkColorChooser;root=Tkinter.Tk();root.withdraw();");
7465 
7466  if ( tfd_isDarwin( ) )
7467  {
7468  strcat( lDialogString ,
7469 "import os;os.system('''osascript -e 'tell app \\\"Finder\\\" to set \
7470 frontmost of process \\\"Python\\\" to true' ''');");
7471  }
7472 
7473  strcat( lDialogString , "res=tkColorChooser.askcolor(color='" ) ;
7474  strcat(lDialogString, lDefaultHexRGB ) ;
7475  strcat(lDialogString, "'") ;
7476 
7477 
7478  if ( aTitle && strlen(aTitle) )
7479  {
7480  strcat(lDialogString, ",title='") ;
7481  strcat(lDialogString, aTitle) ;
7482  strcat(lDialogString, "'") ;
7483  }
7484  strcat( lDialogString , ");\
7485 \nif res[1] is not None:\n\tprint res[1]\"" ) ;
7486  }
7487  else
7488  {
7489  if (aTitle&&!strcmp(aTitle,"tinyfd_query")){return tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle,NULL,NULL);}
7490  lPointerInputBox = tinyfd_inputBox(NULL, NULL, NULL); /* obtain a pointer on the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
7491  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lDialogString, lPointerInputBox); /* preserve the current content of tinyfd_inputBox */
7492  p = tinyfd_inputBox(aTitle, "Enter hex rgb color (i.e. #f5ca20)", lDefaultHexRGB);
7493 
7494  if ( !p || (strlen(p) != 7) || (p[0] != '#') )
7495  {
7496  return NULL ;
7497  }
7498  for ( i = 1 ; i < 7 ; i ++ )
7499  {
7500  if ( ! isxdigit( (int) p[i] ) )
7501  {
7502  return NULL ;
7503  }
7504  }
7505  Hex2RGB(p,aoResultRGB);
7506  strcpy(lDefaultHexRGB, p);
7507  if (lPointerInputBox) strcpy(lPointerInputBox, lDialogString); /* restore its previous content to tinyfd_inputBox */
7508  return lDefaultHexRGB;
7509  }
7510 
7511  if (tinyfd_verbose) printf( "lDialogString: %s\n" , lDialogString ) ;
7512  if ( ! ( lIn = popen( lDialogString , "r" ) ) )
7513  {
7514  return NULL ;
7515  }
7516  while ( fgets( lBuff , sizeof( lBuff ) , lIn ) != NULL )
7517  {
7518  }
7519  pclose( lIn ) ;
7520  if ( ! strlen( lBuff ) )
7521  {
7522  return NULL ;
7523  }
7524  /* printf( "len Buff: %lu\n" , strlen(lBuff) ) ; */
7525  /* printf( "lBuff0: %s\n" , lBuff ) ; */
7526  if ( lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] == '\n' )
7527  {
7528  lBuff[strlen( lBuff ) -1] = '\0' ;
7529  }
7530 
7531  if ( lWasZenity3 )
7532  {
7533  if ( lBuff[0] == '#' )
7534  {
7535  if ( strlen(lBuff)>7 )
7536  {
7537  lBuff[3]=lBuff[5];
7538  lBuff[4]=lBuff[6];
7539  lBuff[5]=lBuff[9];
7540  lBuff[6]=lBuff[10];
7541  lBuff[7]='\0';
7542  }
7543  Hex2RGB(lBuff,aoResultRGB);
7544  }
7545  else if ( lBuff[3] == '(' ) {
7546 #if (defined(__cplusplus ) && __cplusplus >= 201103L) || (defined(__STDC_VERSION__) && __STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L) || defined(__clang__)
7547  sscanf(lBuff,"rgb(%hhu,%hhu,%hhu", & aoResultRGB[0], & aoResultRGB[1],& aoResultRGB[2]);
7548 #else
7549  aoResultRGB[0] = strtol(lBuff+4, & lTmp2, 10 );
7550  aoResultRGB[1] = strtol(lTmp2+1, & lTmp2, 10 );
7551  aoResultRGB[2] = strtol(lTmp2+1, NULL, 10 );
7552 #endif
7553  RGB2Hex(aoResultRGB,lBuff);
7554  }
7555  else if ( lBuff[4] == '(' ) {
7556 #if (defined(__cplusplus ) && __cplusplus >= 201103L) || (defined(__STDC_VERSION__) && __STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L) || defined(__clang__)
7557  sscanf(lBuff,"rgba(%hhu,%hhu,%hhu", & aoResultRGB[0], & aoResultRGB[1],& aoResultRGB[2]);
7558 #else
7559  aoResultRGB[0] = strtol(lBuff+5, & lTmp2, 10 );
7560  aoResultRGB[1] = strtol(lTmp2+1, & lTmp2, 10 );
7561  aoResultRGB[2] = strtol(lTmp2+1, NULL, 10 );
7562 #endif
7563  RGB2Hex(aoResultRGB,lBuff);
7564  }
7565  }
7566  else if ( lWasOsascript || lWasXdialog )
7567  {
7568  /* printf( "lBuff: %s\n" , lBuff ) ; */
7569 #if (defined(__cplusplus ) && __cplusplus >= 201103L) || (defined(__STDC_VERSION__) && __STDC_VERSION__ >= 199901L) || defined(__clang__)
7570  sscanf(lBuff,"%hhu %hhu %hhu", & aoResultRGB[0], & aoResultRGB[1],& aoResultRGB[2]);
7571 #else
7572  aoResultRGB[0] = strtol(lBuff, & lTmp2, 10 );
7573  aoResultRGB[1] = strtol(lTmp2+1, & lTmp2, 10 );
7574  aoResultRGB[2] = strtol(lTmp2+1, NULL, 10 );
7575 #endif
7576  RGB2Hex(aoResultRGB,lBuff);
7577  }
7578  else
7579  {
7580  Hex2RGB(lBuff,aoResultRGB);
7581  }
7582  /* printf("%d %d %d\n", aoResultRGB[0],aoResultRGB[1],aoResultRGB[2]); */
7583  /* printf( "lBuff: %s\n" , lBuff ) ; */
7584 
7585  strcpy(lDefaultHexRGB,lBuff);
7586  return lDefaultHexRGB ;
7587 }
7588 
7589 #endif /* _WIN32 */
